devices.name: Wind Sensor
devices.description: Wind Sensor with controllable LED

devices.name: Pulse
devices.description: The Adeunis Pulse impulse interface allows connecting up to 2 connectable meters (water, gas, electricity, etc) and provides LoRaWAN® connectivity.

devices.name: Analog
devices.description: The Adeunis Analog has 2 inputs for connecting 0-10 V or 4-20 mA sensors and provides LoRaWAN® connectivity to industrial analog/analog PWM sensors already installed on the production sites.

devices.name: Dry Contact
devices.description: The Adeunis Dry Contact has 4 configurable inputs/outputs for connecting sensors (E.g. contact sensor, double level sensor, water leak spot, or water leak cable) and provides LoRaWAN® connectivity. It reports 0-1 states and controls relays.

devices.name: FTD Network Tester
devices.description: The Adeunis FTD (Field Test Device) is a LoRaWAN® network tester that consists of a GPS receiver and a temperature sensor. It checks network coverages and chooses the most appropriate network for ensuring the good positioning of end devices.

devices.name: Modbus
devices.description: The Adeunis Modbus provides an interface for Modbus slave devices to connect with LoRaWAN® networks. It is compatible with RS485/RS232 and provides supervision of up to 20 slaves.

devices.name: Temp
devices.description: The Adeunis Temp is a LoRaWAN® device that supports integrated and remote temperature probes for measuring and monitoring temperature in indoor and outdoor environments.

devices.name: TK-4 RF Multi jet Dry type Water Meter
devices.description: The Baylan TK-4 RF Multi jet Dry type Water Meter consists of a pulse sensor (counter) for reading water usage and it transmits the meter reading via LoRaWAN® radio network.

devices.name: Parking Lot Sensor
devices.description: The BOSCH wireless smart parking sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that uses a magnetometer and radar which are two independent sensors for parking space occupancy. It enables active parking lot management features, such as search, navigation, and reservation. In addition to that, the BOSCH parking lot sensor has a GPS receiver and a temperature sensor.
devices.vendor-name: Bosch Connected Devices and Solutions GmbH

devices.name: LPN TD-1 Tracker
devices.description: The Comtac LPN TD-1 is a LoRaWAN® indoor/outdoor positioning tracker that uses GPS and WiFi or a combination of both to determine the location. Ideal for tracking devices, machines, tools, vehicles, persons, and many more.

devices.name: LPN KM - Short-circuit monitor
devices.description: The Comtac LPN KM Short Circuit monitor detects short-circuit and ground fault. The integrated battery-supported power supply and the easy integration into private or public LoRaWAN® networks allow a cost-effective upgrade of stations for faster fault localization and resupply.

devices.name: LPN TSM Transformer station monitor
devices.description: The Comtac LPN TSM Transformer station monitor records most of the relevant metering values and signals for the monitoring of the operating status and the transmission of error and alarm messages. It also includes a temperature sensor for room temperature monitoring.

devices.name: LPN CM-4 Sensor
devices.description: The comtac LPN CM-4 SENSOR has a built-in temperature sensor and a humidity sensor that records temperature and moisture at programmable intervals. The collected data is sent over the LoRaWAN® network for further processing.

devices.name: DL-IAM
devices.description: The INDOOR AMBIANCE MONITOR from the Decentlab is a LoRaWAN® end device that consists of a CO2 sensor, TVOC sensor, temperature sensor, humidity sensor, barometric pressure sensor, ambient light intensity sensor, and PIR motion sensor. Suitable for building automation, activity and visitor frequency monitoring, energy and HVAC optimization, shop and workplace comfort enhancement.

devices.name: DL-PR26
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PR26 consists of a pressure/liquid level sensor and a temperature sensor. It is made for measuring and monitoring liquid levels and pressure in tanks, wells, groundwater, boreholes, and also leak detection, and pump monitoring.

devices.name: DL-MBX
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-MBX is equipped with an ultrasonic distance/level sensor for measuring distance. Suitable for monitoring water level, flood, snow level, silo level, etc.

devices.name: DL-5TM
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-5TM is equipped with a legacy soil moisture and a temperature sensor. Suitable for applications such as irrigation control, smart agriculture, parks, and golf courses.

devices.name: DL-ATM22
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-ATM22 consists of wind speed, wind gust, wind direction, tilt, and temperature sensors. It is suitable for smart agriculture, urban heat islands, and building automation.

devices.name: DL-ATM41
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-ATM41 consists of solar radiation, precipitation, vapor pressure, barometric pressure, humidity, temperature, horizontal wind speed, wind gust, wind direction, tilt, and lighting sensors. It is suitable for smart agriculture, urban heat islands, frost alarming, microclimate, and building automation.

devices.name: DL-CTD10
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-CTD10 consists of pressure/liquid level, temperature, and electrical conductivity sensors. It is suitable for use in monitoring level/depth and water quality in tanks for liquids, groundwater and wells, running or open water level and quality, and salinity and chloride monitoring.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-002
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-002 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of a Pulse Counter Dry Contact sensor interface.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-003
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-003 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of a Digital Input Dry Contact sensor interface.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-004
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-004 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of an Analog 4 … 20 mA Sensor.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-005
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-005 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of an Analog 0 … 3 V  Sensor.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-006
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-006 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of an Analog Potentiometer Sensor.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-008
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-008 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of an Analog PT100 Sensor.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-010
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-010 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of a Dual Pulse Counter Dry Contact sensor interface.

devices.name: DL-DLR2-012
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DLR2-012 is an Analog or Digital Sensor Device for LoRaWAN® that consists of an Analog Strain Gauge Sensor.

devices.name: DL-DS18
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DS18 is equipped with a temperature sensor for measuring temperature. Suitable for applications such as outdoor remote monitoring, cold chain, storage, building automation, smart agriculture, open water, and tank temperature, etc.

devices.name: DL-DWS
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-DWS is a WEIGHING SCALE FOR LoRaWAN® that comes with a ‘vibrating wire for weight’ sensor. Suitable for applications such as logistics, inventory, and weighing.

devices.name: DL-ITST
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-ITST is equipped with an infrared pyrometer (thermometer) for measuring surface temperature. Ideal for road surface monitoring, ice warning, and smart agriculture.

devices.name: DL-KL66
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-KL66 is equipped with a vibrating wire that works as a strain/ weight sensor for measuring strain and weight. Suitable for monitoring silo fill level, structural health, weighing, component deformation and strain, and cracks.

devices.name: DL-LID
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-LID is equipped with a distance/level sensor for measuring distance. Suitable for generic ranging and proximity monitoring, snow level monitoring, water level monitoring, and flood monitoring.

devices.name: DL-LP8P
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-LP8P is a LoRaWAN® end device equipped with CO₂, temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure sensors. Suitable for applications such as goods and storage condition monitoring, indoor and outdoor air quality, building automation, energy-saving, and smart agriculture.

devices.name: DL-OPTOD
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-OPTOD consists of dissolved oxygen and temperature sensors. It is suitable for use in wastewater treatment, industrial effluent treatment, open water monitoring, fish farming, aquarium, and drinking water monitoring.

devices.name: DL-PAR
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PAR consists of a Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR) sensor for measuring the amount of light available for photosynthesis. It is suitable for use in outdoor environments, greenhouses, and growth chambers.

devices.name: DL-PM
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PM is equipped with PM1, PM2.5, PM4, PM10, temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure sensors for air quality and environmental monitoring.

devices.name: DL-PR21
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PR21 is equipped with pressure, liquid level, and temperature sensors. It is suitable for use with water distribution systems for measuring and monitoring liquid levels, temperature, and leaks.

devices.name: DL-PR36
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PR36 is a LoRaWAN®end-device that is equipped with a high precision pressure/liquid level sensor and a temperature sensor. Suitable for measuring water/liquid levels in tanks, wells, boreholes, groundwater, etc.

devices.name: DL-PR36CTD
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PR36CTD includes pressure, temperature, and electrical conductivity sensors. It is suitable for measuring water levels and monitoring water quality, salinity, and chloride.

devices.name: DL-PYR
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-PYR consists of a solar radiation sensor for measuring solar radiation. It is suitable for measuring radiations in solar panel arrays, smart agriculture, and building automation.

devices.name: DL-RHC
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-RCH is equipped with high-precision air temperature and humidity sensors for environmental monitoring. Suitable for smart agriculture, urban heat islands, greenhouses, frost alarming, and building automation.

devices.name: DL-SHT35-001
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-SHT35-001 is equipped with a temperature and a humidity sensor that can be used for monitoring and measuring air temperature and humidity. Suitable for applications such as smart agriculture, urban heat islands, greenhouses, frost alarming, and building automation.

devices.name: DL-SHT35-002
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-SHT35-002 is equipped with a temperature and humidity sensor for environmental monitoring. Suitable for cold chain, storage, building automation, smart agriculture applications.

devices.name: DL-SMTP
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-SMTP consists of soil moisture and temperature sensors. It is suitable for irrigation control, smart agriculture, greenhouse and soilless plantations, parks, and golf courses.

devices.name: DL-TBRG
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-TBRG consists of a precipitation sensor for measuring rainfall. It is suitable for precipitation and weather monitoring, flood monitoring, and smart agriculture.

devices.name: DL-TRS11
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-TRS11 includes a volumetric water content (VWC), temperature, and dielectric permittivity sensor. It is suitable for irrigation control, smart agriculture, greenhouse and soilless plantations, parks, and golf courses.

devices.name: DL-TRS12
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-TRS12 includes a volumetric water content (VWC), temperature, and dielectric permittivity sensor. It is suitable for irrigation control, smart agriculture, greenhouse and soilless plantations, parks, and golf courses.

devices.name: DL-TRS21
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-TRS21 is a soil water potential and temperature sensor for LoRaWAN®. Suitable for applications such as irrigation control, smart agriculture, parks, and golf courses.

devices.name: DL-WRM
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-WRM includes an infrared pyrometer, temperature, and humidity sensors. It is suitable for use in winter road maintenance, frost alarming, ice alerting, and smart agriculture.

devices.name: DL-ZN1
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-ZN1 comes with a linear position dendrometer that can measure the growth of plants and trees. It is suitable for use in irrigation control, smart agriculture, forestry, plantation, and ecophysiology applications.

devices.name: DL-ZN2
devices.description: The Decentlab DL-ZN2 comes with a linear position dendrometer that can measure the growth of plants and trees. It is suitable for use in irrigation control, smart agriculture, forestry, plantation, and ecophysiology.

devices.name: Oyster
devices.description: The Digital Matter Oyster is an ultra-rugged and long-life battery-powered GPS tracking device for asset tracking and management on LoRaWAN® networks that is packed with a GPS+GLONASS sensor and a 3-axis accelerometer. The IP67 rated housing ensures the device can withstand fine dust, high-pressure spray, submersion for 30 minutes in 1m of water, and extreme temperatures.

devices.name: Yabby Edge
devices.description: The Digital Matter Yabby Edge is a LoRaWAN® indoor/outdoor asset tracker that combines GNSS and WiFi scanning. It is the first industrial asset tracking device to feature Semtech’s LoRa Edge™ LR1110 Asset Management platform and advanced cloud-based location calculations, significantly reducing power consumption and extending battery life.

devices.name: Wireless M-Bus Range Extender
devices.description: The IMST Wireless M-Bus Range Extender is a compact and cost-effective device that collects wireless M-Bus messages from utility meters and forwards them to a LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: iOKE868
devices.description: The IMST iOKE868 LoRaWAN® optical reading head unit leverages the long range and low power consumption of LoRa® to provide real-time data monitoring of energy consumption and secure connectivity to the LoRaWAN® IoT network.

devices.name: ADT1 Tube
devices.description: The KELLER ADT1-Tube is a remote transmission unit with a data logger compatible with selected KELLER level probes and pressure transmitters. It is suitable for use in groundwater level monitoring, flood early warning systems, tank level monitoring, and pressure monitoring applications.

devices.name: ADT1 Box
devices.description: The KELLER ADT1-Box is an autonomous device that can be linked with digital level probes and pressure transmitters in the KELLER D and X product lines. The measured data can be collected through a LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: ARC1 Tube
devices.description: The KELLER ARC1-Tube is a remote transmission unit with a data logger. It records measurements made by external sensors (e.g. a level probes) and periodically transmits the collected data via LoRaWAN®.

devices.name: ARC1 Box
devices.description: The KELLER ARC1-Box is a remote transmission unit with a data logger. It records measurements made by external sensors (e.g. a level probe) and periodically transmits the collected data via LoRaWAN®.

devices.name: Sentrius RS1xx Temp-RH Sensor
devices.description: The Laird Sentrius™ RS1xx Temp/-RH has a temperature sensor, humidity sensor, and an external open/closed detection sensor making it a perfect fit for cold chain applications. It uses LoRaWAN® and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) for data communication. The robust IP65 sensor enclosure allows it to be used in harsh environments.

devices.name: Sentrius RS1xx Ext Temp 1W Sensor
devices.description: The Laird Sentrius™ RS1xx Temp/-RH has an external temperature sensor probe and humidity sensor making it a perfect fit for industrial applications. It uses LoRaWAN® and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) for data communication. The robust IP65 sensor enclosure allows it to be used in harsh environments.

devices.name: Sentrius RS1xx Multi Sensor
devices.description: The Laird Sentrius RS1xx Multi Sensor is a battery-powered, long-range sensor platform leveraging the benefits of LoRaWAN® and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) connectivity. Its small, rugged form factor contains superior RF performance and multiple sensor capabilities including Open/Closed detection alongside temperature and humidity sensors, making it a perfect fit for cold chain applications.

devices.name: Sentrius RS1xx Ext Temp RTD Sensor
devices.description: The Laird Sentrius™ RS1xx Ext Temp RTD has an external temperature sensor probe making it a perfect fit for monitoring low and slow cooking temps mounted inside a smoker. It transmits data over LoRaWAN® and Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE). The robust IP65 sensor enclosure allows it to be used in harsh environments and suitable for food safety management, agricultural environment monitoring, and industrial heating and cooling.

devices.name: Animal Activity Sensor
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4430 Activity Sensor Wing allows mounting Panasonic WL series PIR sensors and connecting additional external sensors. It can be used with MCCI Catena 4610, Catena 4612/4618, and the Adafruit Feather M0 with LoRa® radio system, but suitable for use with any Adafruit Feather CPU board.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4450 Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4450 Node for LoRaWAN® technology is a powerful open-source IoT device that consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, lux sensors and also allows the connection of various external sensors. It is designed specifically for use with The Things Network. It is based on the Adafruit Feather M0. The Catena 4450 Node is a ready-to-use platform for LoRaWAN 1.0 and 1.1 wireless IoT applications.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4460 Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4460 Node for LoRaWAN® technology is a powerful open-source IoT device that consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, lux, and volatile organic compound (VOC) sensors and also allows the connection of various external sensors. It is designed specifically for use with The Things Network. It is based on the Adafruit Feather M0. The Catena 4460 Node is a ready-to-use platform for LoRaWAN 1.0 and 1.1 wireless IoT applications.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4470 Node with Modbus
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4470 Node with Modbus for LoRaWAN® technology is a powerful open-source IoT device that consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, and lux sensors and also allows it to connect various external sensors. It is designed specifically to integrate Modbus control with The Things Network. It is based on the Adafruit Feather M0. The Catena 4470 Node with Modbus is a ready-to-use platform for LoRaWAN 1.0.2 and 1.1 wireless IoT applications.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4610 Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4610 is a LoRaWAN® development board that consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, infrared, white light, and UV sensors. It is based on the Murata CMWX1ZZABZ-078 and designed to be compatible with the Adafruit Feather family of development boards and accessories.The Catena 4610 is a great platform for LoRaWAN investigation and deployment.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4612 Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4612 is a LoRaWAN® development board that consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, infrared, white light, and UV sensors. It is based on the Murata CMWX1ZZABZ-078 and designed to be compatible with the Adafruit Feather family of development boards and accessories.The Catena 4612 Node is a great platform for LoRaWAN investigation and deployment.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4618 Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4618 Node is a LoRaWAN® development board that consists of temperature, humidity, infrared, white light, and UV sensors. It is based on the Murata CMWX1ZZABZ-078 and designed to be compatible with the Adafruit Feather family of development boards and accessories.The Catena 4618 is a great platform for LoRaWAN investigation and deployment.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4618 M201 Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4618 M201 Node is a LoRaWAN® development board that consists of temperature, humidity, infrared, white light, and UV sensors. It is based on the Murata CMWX1ZZABZ-078 and designed to be compatible with the Adafruit Feather family of development boards and accessories.The Catena 4618 M201 Node is a great platform for LoRaWAN investigation and deployment.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4801 Modbus Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4801 RS-485 Node for LoRaWAN® technology networks is a complete open-source single-board IoT device that can monitor and control remote Modbus, M-Bus and other industrial devices. It also allows connecting external sensors. Based on the Murata CMWX1ZZABZ-078, the Catena 4801 is a great platform for RS-485/Modbus based LoRaWAN investigation and deployment.

devices.name: MCCI Catena® 4802 Modbus/Sensor Node
devices.description: The MCCI Catena® 4802 RS-485/Sensor Node for LoRaWAN® technology networks is a complete open-source single-board IoT device that can monitor and control remote Modbus, M-Bus, and other industrial devices, while also monitoring temperature and humidity with an integrated Sensirion SHT31 sensor. It also incorporates a QWICC connector for easy connection of external I2C devices.

devices.name: Model 4811 Remote Power Meter
devices.description: Real-time power monitor for commercial and residential buildings

devices.name: Model 4821 Indoor Environmental Sensor (BME280)
devices.description: The MCCI® Model 4821 Indoor Environment Sensor is based on MCCI Catena 4612 which consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, and light sensors.

devices.name: Model 4822 Indoor Environmental Sensor (SHT31)
devices.description: The MCCI® Model 4822 Indoor Environment Sensor (SHT31) is based on MCCI Catena 4618 which consists of temperature, humidity, and light sensors.

devices.name: Model 4823 Precision Indoor Environmental Sensor (with SHT35)
devices.description: The MCCI® Model 4823 Precision Indoor Environment Sensor (with SHT35) is based on MCCI Catena 4618 M201 which consists of temperature, humidity, and light sensors.

devices.name: Model 4831 Outdoor Environmental Sensor (SHT31)
devices.description: The MCCI® Model 4831 Outdoor Environment Sensor (SHT31) is based on MCCI Catena 4618 which consists of temperature, humidity, and light sensors.

devices.name: Model 4832 High-Accuracy Outdoor Environmental Sensor (SHT35)
devices.description: The MCCI® Model 4832 High-Accuracy Outdoor Environment Sensor (SHT35) is based on MCCI Catena 4618 M201 which consists of temperature, humidity, and light sensors.

devices.name: Indoor Air Quality Sensor
devices.description: The MCCI Indoor Air Quality Sensor consists of  PM1.0, PM2.5, PM10, dust concentration, total volatile organic compounds, temperature, and humidity sensors. It transmits data using LoRaWAN® networks.

devices.name: MCF-LW06DAVK
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW06DAVK is equipped with a wide range of sensors such as temperature, humidity, barometric pressure, rainfall, wind speed and direction, solar radiation, PM1, PM2.5, and PM10. Suitable for smart agriculture, industry, smart city, waste station control, etc.

devices.name: MCF-LW06DAVPK
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW06DAVPK integrates a LoRaWAN® communication system in a Davis Instruments Vantage Pro2 Weather Station. The station is equipped with a wide range of sensors such as temperature, humidity, pressure, rainfall, dew point, wind speed, wind direction, solar radiation, PM1, PM2.5, and PM10.

devices.name: MCF-LW12CO2
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW12CO2 LoRaWAN® indoor environmental sensor equipped with temperature, humidity, pressure, light intensity, air quality (expressed as IAQ or bVOC value), and CO2 sensors and sends collected data over the LoRaWAN® network. Ideally suited for a wide range of applications such as building automation, condition monitoring, predictive maintenance, security, healthcare, and many more use cases.

devices.name: MCF-LW12CO2E
devices.description: The MCF-LW12CO2E is a battery powered sensor for indoor applications that reads temperature, relative humidity, pressure, ambient light, IAQ air quality index and CO2. Ideally suited for a wide range of applications such as home buildings, air quality monitoring and energy saving applications.

devices.name: MCF-LW12MET
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW12MET is a LoRaWAN® Mono-Phase Energy Meter with I/O that can be used for monitoring and checking the power of electronic devices, and can remotely switch devices on/off and read the state of digital input.

devices.name: MCF-LW12PLG
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW12PLG is a LoRaWAN® Energy Meter plug with On/Off capability that supports metering and switching of a 230Vac – 16 Amp Load (active, reactive, and apparent energy; Class 0.2).

devices.name: MCF-LW12TER
devices.description: The mfc88 MCF-LW12TER is a LoRaWAN® end device that has a temperature sensor, humidity sensor, and pressure sensor for monitoring indoor environments. The collected data is transmitted over the LoRaWAN network. Ideally suited for a wide range of applications such as building automation, condition monitoring, predictive maintenance, security, healthcare, and many more use cases.

devices.name: MCF-LW12TERWP
devices.description: The mfc88 MCF-LW12TERWP is a LoRaWAN® end device that has a temperature sensor, humidity sensor, and pressure sensor for monitoring outdoor environments. Ideally suited for a wide range of applications such as weather stations, urban monitoring, air quality, industrial, environmental, or farming projects.

devices.name: MCF-LW12TERPM
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW12TERPM is an outdoor PM and environmental sensor that consists of temperature, humidity, pressure, and PM (PM1, PM2.5, PM10) sensors. It sends collected data over the LoRaWAN® network. Ideally suited for a wide range of applications such as weather stations, urban monitoring, air quality, industrial, environmental, or farming projects.

devices.name: MCF-LW12VOC
devices.description: The mfc88 MCF-LW12VOC is a LoRaWAN® end device that has a temperature sensor, humidity sensor, pressure sensor, light intensity sensor, and an air quality sensor for monitoring indoor environments. Ideally suited for a wide range of applications such as building automation, condition monitoring, predictive maintenance, security, healthcare, and many more use cases.

devices.name: MCF-LW13IO
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW13IO is a wireless actuator that consists of an Opto-isolated input and a relay output. The device transmits the status of its input and controls the output through the LoRaWAN® network. Can be used for industrial process control and home automation, water treatment, agriculture irrigation, and similar applications.

devices.name: MCF-LW13MIO
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LW13MIO is a LoRaWAN® multi I/O module that transmits the state of its 16 inputs and controls 8 outputs through the LoRaWAN® network. All these inputs and outputs are galvanically isolated. It can be used for industrial process control, home automation, water treatment, agriculture irrigation, and similar applications.

devices.name: MCF-LWWS00
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LWWS00 integrates a LoRaWAN® communication system in a Davis Instruments Vantage Pro2 Weather Station. The station is equipped with a wide range of sensors such as temperature, humidity, pressure, rainfall, dew point, wind speed, wind direction, solar radiation, PM1, PM2.5, and PM10. Suitable for smart agriculture, industry, smart city, and waste station control applications.

devices.name: MCF-LWWS01
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LWWS01 integrates a LoRaWAN® communication system in a Davis Instruments Vantage Pro2 Weather Station. The station is equipped with a wide range of sensors such as temperature, humidity, pressure, rainfall, dew point, wind speed, wind direction, solar radiation, PM1, PM2.5, and PM10. Suitable for smart agriculture, industry, smart city, and waste station control applications.

devices.name: MCF-LWWS02
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LWWS02 integrates a LoRaWAN® communication system in a Davis Instruments Vantage Pro2 Weather Station. The station is equipped with a wide range of sensors such as temperature, humidity, pressure, rainfall, dew point, wind speed, wind direction, solar radiation, PM1, PM2.5, and PM10. Suitable for smart agriculture, industry, smart city, and waste station control applications.

devices.name: MCF-LWWS03
devices.description: The mcf88 MCF-LWWS03 integrates a LoRaWAN® communication system in a Davis Instruments Vantage Pro2 Weather Station. The station is equipped with a wide range of sensors such as temperature, humidity, pressure, rainfall, dew point, wind speed, wind direction, solar radiation, PM1, PM2.5, and PM10. Suitable for smart agriculture, industry, smart city, and waste station control applications.

devices.name: MultiTech xDot® Long Range LoRa Module
devices.description: The MultiTech xDot® is a secure, CE/FCC/RCM/GITEKI certified, Arm® Mbed™ programmable, low-power RF module, that provides long-range, low bit rate M2M data connectivity to sensors, industrial equipment, and remote appliances. The xDot is LoRaWAN® 1.0.2 compliant, providing bi-directional data communication up to 10 miles/15 km line-of-sight and 1-3 miles / 2 km into buildings, using sub-GHz ISM bands in North America, Europe, Australia (AU915), Asia Pacific (AS923), India (IN865) and Korea (KR920).

devices.name: R311A - Wireless Window Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R311A Wireless Door/Window Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that contains a magnetic sensor (reed switch) for detecting the opening and closing of doors and windows. When the opening or closing status is detected an uplink containing the desired values is transferred to the LoRaWAN® network. The device provides low power consumption and longer battery life.

devices.name: R311B - Wireless Light Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R311B Wireless Light Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that contains a light sensor for detecting ambient illumination. The R311B reports the illuminance periodically along with some other information to the LoRaWAN® network. The device provides low power consumption and longer battery life.

devices.name: R311G - Wireless Light Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R311G Wireless Light Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that consists of a built-in photosensitive sensor that can be used for detecting the surrounding illuminance. With two CR2450 coin-cell batteries, R311G provides low power consumption and longer battery life.

devices.name: R311LA - Wireless Infrared Proximity Sensor
devices.description: R311LA is able to detect the existence of the object nearby. It has an infrared proximity sensor that can detect if there is object existing within it detection range and transmits the detected data to Gateway for display via a wireless network; it uses the SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R311W - Wireless Water leak Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R311W Water Leak Detector comes with two water leak sensors suitable for detecting water and other liquid leaks in residential and commercial buildings. When the sensor detects a leak, an alarm message will be sent to the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: R312 - Wireless Door Bell Button
devices.description: The Netvox R312 Wireless Door Bell Button is a LoRaWAN® end device that contains a push button for detecting button presses by the user. When a button press is detected an uplink containing the desired values is transferred to the LoRaWAN® network. The device provides low power consumption and longer battery life.

devices.name: R312A - Wireless Emergency Button
devices.description: The Netvox R312A Wireless Emergency Button is a LoRaWAN® end device that contains a push button for detecting button presses by the user. When a button press is detected an uplink containing the desired values is transferred to the LoRaWAN® network. The device provides low power consumption and longer battery life.

devices.name: R602A - LoRa-Siren
devices.description: R602A is a smart wireless alarm that can communicate with other devices through a wireless network. It has a high-decibel speaker and high-brightness LED which can realize sound and light alarms. It adopts SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R711 - Wireless Temperature and Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R711 Wireless Temperature and Humidity Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that has a built-in temperature and humidity sensor. Suitable for monitoring indoor ambient temperature and humidity.

devices.name: R711A - Wireless Temperature Sensor
devices.description: R711A is mainly used to detect the temperature of indoor air. It transmits the collected data to other devices for display through the wireless network communication module.

devices.name: R718A - Temperature and Humidity Sensor for Low Temperature Environment
devices.description: The Netvox R718A Temperature and Humidity Sensor - for Low Temperature Environment contains a temperature sensor and a humidity sensor that is capable of measuring temperature and humidity at low-temperature environments. Ideal for use in domestic and commercial refrigerators to measure temperature and humidity when storing and transporting food, medicines, flowers, and other goods. The measured data will be sent to a LoRaWAN® network for further processing.

devices.name: R718AB - Wireless Temperature and Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718AB - Temperature and Humidity Sensor is ideal for measuring ambient temperature and humidity in residential and commercial buildings.

devices.name: R718AD - Wireless Temperature Sensor
devices.description: The R718AD is a wireless communication device for detecting temperature. The temperature sensor probe contacts an object to detect the temperature, and the detected data is transmitted to other devices through a wireless network. The SX1276 wireless communication module is used.

devices.name: R718B - Wireless Resistance Temperature Detector
devices.description: The Netvox R718B - Wireless Resistance Temperature Detector comes with an external resistance temperature detector (PT1000) sensor to measure the temperature. The device can be used with a round-head, needle, or L-type probe. Suitable for measuring temperature in ovens, industrial control equipment, and for the semiconductor industry.

devices.name: R718B2 - Wireless 2-Gang Temperature Sensor
devices.description: R718B2 connects two external resistance temperature detectors (PT1000) to measures the temperature.

devices.name: R718CK - Wireless Thermocouple Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718CK consists of a thermocouple sensor for detecting the temperature of objects and mediums in which the thermocouple is contacted. It uses the SX1276 wireless communication module for LoRaWAN® communication.

devices.name: R718CK2 - Wireless 2-Gang Thermocouple Sensor
devices.description: This equipment is used to detect temperature of the object and medium which thermocouple is contacted. It can be connected to two thermocouples for testing. It uses SX1276 wireless communication module. R718CX2 can be connected according to requirements [ type K (R718CK2), type T thermocouple (R718CT2), type R thermocouple (R718CR2), type N thermocouple (R718CN2). The collected data is displayed in the gateway.]

devices.name: R718CT - Wireless Thermocouple Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718CT consists of a thermocouple sensor for detecting the temperature of objects and mediums in which the thermocouple is contacted. It uses the SX1276 wireless communication module for LoRaWAN® communication.

devices.name: R718CT2 - Wireless 2-Gang Thermocouple Sensor
devices.description: This equipment is used to detect temperature of the object and medium which thermocouple is contacted. It can be connected to two thermocouples for testing. It uses SX1276 wireless communication module. R718CX2 can be connected according to requirements [type K (R718CK2), type T thermocouple (R718CT2), type R thermocouple (R718CR2), type N thermocouple (R718CN2). The collected data is displayed in the gateway.]

devices.name: R718E - Three-Axis Digital Accelerometer&NTC Thermistor
devices.description: The Netvox R718E Three-Axis Digital Accelerometer & NTC Thermistor is a LoRaWAN® end device that contains a 3-axis accelerometer and an external NTC thermistor that can detect the movement or vibration and the surface temperature of the measured object.

devices.name: R718F - Wireless Reed Switch Open/Close Detection Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718F - Wireless Reed Switch Open/Close Detection Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that has a reed switch to detect whether two objects are separated or not. Ideal for detecting the status of a door or window for security purposes.

devices.name: R718G - Wireless Light Sensor
devices.description: The device has a built-in light sensor that can be used for ambient light intensity detection. It uses the SX1276 wireless communication module. The R718G detects the ambient light intensity value and adds it to the gateway. The collected data is displayed in other devices

devices.name: R718H - Wireless Pulse Counter Interface
devices.description: The device is connected with a pulse detection interface, which can calculate the number of pulses and send the detected number of pulses to the gateway display. It uses the SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R718H2 - Wireless 2-Input Pulse Counter
devices.description: The device is connected with two pulse detection interfaces, which can calculate the number of pulses and send the detected number of pulses to the gateway display. It uses the SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R718KA - Wireless-mA Current Meter Interface, 4~20mA
devices.description: The Wireless 4-20mA DC Current Meter is designed to offer a large selection of easy-to-use current 4-20mA data loggers for load monitoring. The wireless communication is compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol (ClassA).

devices.name: R718N1 - Wireless 1-Phase Current Meter with 1 x 30A Solid Core CT
devices.description: The Netvox R718N1 1-Phase Current Meter is a LoRaWAN® end device with an external solid-core current transformer that can be used to obtain the single-phase current of a live wire. R718N1 series have different measuring range for different variety of CT; 30A (Solid Core CT and Clamp-On CT types), 75A (Clamp-On CT), 150A (Clamp-On CT), 250A (Clamp-On CT), 630A (Clamp-On CT).

devices.name: R718N3 - Wireless 3-Phase Current Meter With 3 x 50A Solid Core CT
devices.description: The Netvox R718N3 3-Phase Current Meter is a LoRaWAN® end device with three external solid-core current transformers that can be used to obtain the current of a three-phase wiring system. R718N3 series have different measuring range for different variety of CT; 3 x 50A(Solid Core CT), 3 x 75A (Clamp-On CT), 3 x 150A (Clamp-On CT), 3 x 250A (Clamp-On CT), 3 x 630A (Clamp-On CT).

devices.name: R718T - Wireless Push Button Interface
devices.description: The Netvox R718T-Wireless Push Button Interface is a LoRaWAN® end device that sends a notification signal when the connected push button is pushed. Ideal for building panic buttons for emergency assistance.

devices.name: R720A - Temperature and Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R720A-Temperature and Humidity Sensor has a built-in temperature sensor and a humidity sensor that measures ambient temperature and humidity. The measured data will be sent to the LoRaWAN® network for further processing and alerting.

devices.name: R720F - Wireless Liquid Hand Soap Sensor
devices.description: R720F series is a wireless communication device that can detect the existence of hand sanitizer / water leakage. This device is connected with two electrode rods which can be used to detect the state of the insufficient amount of hand sanitizer in the hand sanitizer box or whether there is the water leakage in the detection area.The shape and orientation of electrode rod can be selected according to the needs (R720FLO,R720FLD,R720FU). The electrode rod can be trimmed to the required length by self according to the demand.The function of water leakage detection can choose R720FW.

devices.name: R72615 - Wireless Outdoor CO2/Temperature/Humidity Sensor with Solar Panel
devices.description: The Netvox R72615 is an outdoor environmental sensor that consists of CO2, temperature, and humidity sensors. It is compatible with LoRaWAN® protocol (Class A). The device is powered using a solar panel.

devices.name: R72615A - Wireless CO2/Temperature/Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R72615A has a CO2, temperature, and humidity sensor that detects and transmits CO2 level, ambient temperature, and humidity data. It uses LoRaWAN to transmit data to an application server.

devices.name: R72616 - Wireless Outdoor PM2.5/Temperature/Humidity Sensor with Solar Panel
devices.description: The R72616 is equipped with a temperature and humidity sensor that detects and transmits ambient temperature and humidity data. It is a wireless communication method that uses the SX1276 wireless communication module. The R72616 has a PM2.5 sensor that detects the concentration of PM2.5 in the air.

devices.name: R72616A - Wireless PM2.5/Temperature/Humidity Sensor
devices.description: R72616A with temperature and humidity sensor can detect and send the temperature and humidity data of the environment. The device is in line with the LoRa protocol standard. R72616A with PM2.5 dust sensor can be used to obtain the concentration of suspended particulates in air per unit volume.

devices.name: R72716(RA0716Y) - Wireless Outdoor PM2.5 Temperature Humidity Sensor
devices.description: RA0716Y carrying temperature and humidity sensors that can detect and send the environment temperature and humidity data with wireless communication, compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol standards. R72716 carrying PM2.5 dust sensor which can obtain the concentration of suspended particulate matter in the air per unit volume.

devices.name: R809A - Wireless Power Plug with Power Meter
devices.description: R809A is a Wireless Plug-and-Play Power Outlet with Consumption Monitoring for indoor use. It can remotely control the output switch and detect the output power. It integrates the LoRa/FSK modulation communication wireless module SX1276 which can realize wireless remote control. R809A has a 10A/230VAC output load capability and is primarily used to measure electrical power consumption and wireless switch control.

devices.name: R816B - Wireless US Type Wall Socket with Power Meter
devices.description: R816B (wireless wall socket with energy consumption monitoring (US)) is a smart electrical switch socket for indoor use. It is suitable for US standard wall cassette installation. The output socket is suitable for US standard 2 or 3 pole plug; rated output load is 15A/120V. R816B integrates LoRa/FSK modulation communication wireless module SX1276, which can realize wireless remote control. It can control the single-channel power output to be turned on and off through internal relay, and can detect the current, voltage, power, and electrical energy of the device connected to it. (The output of the upper socket is uncontrolled, the output of the lower socket is the relay control output, and the output power detection function is provided. There is a relay control button and two LED indicators between the two sockets.)

devices.name: RA0715 - Wireless CO2/Temperature/Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox RA0715-Wireless CO2/Temperature/Humidity Sensor for measuring temperature and humidity. It also has a built-in PM2.5 sensor for measuring CO2 concentration in the air to ensure air quality.

devices.name: RA0715Y - Wireless Outdoor CO2/Temperature/Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox RA0715Y is an outdoor environmental sensor that consists of CO2, temperature, and humidity sensors. It is compatible with LoRaWAN® protocol (Class A).

devices.name: RA0716 - Wireless PM2.5/Temperature/Humidity Sensor
devices.description: RA0716 is equipped with the external temperature and humidity sensor which can detect and send the data of the ambient temperature and humidity.It adopts the wireless communication method and conforms to the LoRa protocol standard. RA0716 is equipped with the PM2.5 dust sensor which can be used to detect the concentration of suspended particles in the air per unit volume.

devices.name: RB02I - Wireless Emergency Push Button
devices.description: The Netvox RB02I is a wireless control terminal device that consists of a large push-button for emergency alarm triggering. It features low standby power consumption and is fully compliant with the LoRaWAN® protocol.

devices.name: RB11E - Wireless Occupancy/Temperature/Light Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox RB11E is a Wireless Occupancy/Light/Temperature Sensor that combines occupancy, temperature, tamper switch, and light sensors that are suitable for detecting human movement indoors, illuminance, and temperature. It will send data to a LoRaWAN® network for further processing.

devices.name: R718DA - Wireless Vibration Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718DA - Wireless Vibration Sensor comes with an external rolling ball type sensor. Ideal for detecting movements and vibrations of the attached object.

devices.name: R718DB - Wireless Vibration Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718DB - Wireless Vibration Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device equipped with an external spring-type vibration sensor for detecting movements and vibrations.

devices.name: R718J - Wireless Dry Contact Interface
devices.description: The Netvox R718J-Wireless Dry Contact Interface can be used to detect many different inputs such as smoke sensors, security systems, air conditioning status, UPS status, etc.

devices.name: R718LB - Wireless Hall Type Open/Close
devices.description: The Netvox R718LB - Hall Type Open/Close is a LoRaWAN® end device that consists of a hall-effect sensor to detect the open and close state of anything, for example detecting the opening and closing of doors and windows.

devices.name: R718MBA - Wireless Activity Detection
devices.description: The Netvox R718MBA Wireless Activity Detection Sensor detects sudden movements or vibrations and alerts through the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: R311DA - Wireless Vibration Sensor, Rolling Ball Type
devices.description: The Netvox R311DA Wireless Vibration Sensor comes with a dual ball type single direction tilt sensitive trigger switch capable of detecting movements and vibrations. When the device detects movement or vibration, it immediately sends a message to the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: R311DB - Wireless Vibration Sensor, Spring Type
devices.description: The Netvox R311DB Wireless Vibration Sensor, Spring Type is a LoRaWAN® end device that contains a vibration sensor for detecting movements and vibrations. When a movement or vibration is detected an uplink containing the desired values is transferred to the LoRaWAN® network. The device provides low power consumption and longer battery life.

devices.name: R311FA - Wireless Activity Detection
devices.description: The Netvox R311FA Wireless Activity Detection sensor comes with an accelerometer that supports the detection of sudden movements and vibrations. When the device detects movement or vibration, it immediately sends a message to the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: R718Q - Wireless Short-Range Occupancy Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718PQ-Wireless Short-Range Occupancy Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that has a built-in PIR sensor (pyroelectric human body infrared sensor) for detecting someone, for example detecting someone has entered a room.

devices.name: R718QA - Wireless Toilet Occupancy Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R718PQA-Wireless Toilet Occupancy Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device equipped with a reed switch sensor and a built-in PIR sensor (pyroelectric human body infrared sensor). Suitable occupancy detection for a room, for example, detecting if someone is in the toilet.

devices.name: R311CA - Wireless 2-Input Dry Contact Interface
devices.description: Netvox wireless dry contact sensors can be used to detect contact between two wired contact points. It can realize wireless alarm and other functions through built-in wireless module, and is compatible with LoRaWAN protocol. It can be easily networked with other related devices. The R311CA is durable and ensures optimum use and is a low power consumption device. Due to their small size, they can be installed anywhere, they are wireless, so they take up very little space.

devices.name: R311CB - Wireless Window/Door Sensor and Wireless Glass Sensor
devices.description: The R311CB device has a built-in reed switch sensor and can be externally connected to the reed switch. It can be used for door and window switch status detection and externally connected to broken glass sensor to detect the glass status. It uses the SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R718DA2 - Wireless 2-Gang Vibration Sensor
devices.description: R718DA2 is equipped with two external rolling ball type vibration sensors. When either of the vibration sensors moves or vibrates, R718DA2 can detect vibration or moving signals and send an alert to data center through LoRaWAN™. It is fully compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol (Class A).

devices.name: R718DB2 - Wireless 2-Gang Vibration Sensor Spring Type
devices.description: R718DB2 is equipped with two external spring type vibration sensors. When either of the vibration sensors moves or vibrates, R718DB2 can detect vibration or moving signals and send an alert to data center through LoRaWAN™. It is fully compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol (Class A).

devices.name: R718F2 - Wireless 2-Gang Reed Switch Open/Close Detection Sensor
devices.description: R718F2 is a 2-gang open/close detection sensor that utilizes 2 reed switches to detect whether two objects are separated or not. An example of R718F2’s application is to detect the state of a door or window for security purposes. It is based on SX1276 wireless communication module, and the communication is fully compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol (Class A).

devices.name: R718IA - Wireless 0-5V ADC Sampling Interface
devices.description: The device is designed for a variety of resistive bridge-sensing applications like pressure, temperature, and level-sensing applications. It can also support other applications, weight scale and force-sensing applications that use strain gauge load cells, and other general resistive bridge signal-conditioning applications.

devices.name: R718J2 - Wireless 2-Input Dry Contact Interface
devices.description: R718J2 can be connected to external dry contact devices, such as various switches, buttons, relays and reed switch outputs. It can detect the closure or disconnection signal of the dry contacts. Based on SX1276 wireless communication module, the wireless communication is compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol (ClassA).

devices.name: R718LB2 - Wireless 2-Gang Hall Type Open/Close Detection Sensor
devices.description: This device is equipped with two way Hall sensors, which can be used for door and window switch state detection. It can realize wireless alarm and other functions through the built-in wireless module. It applys SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R311CC - Wireless 2-Gang Window/Door Sensor
devices.description: R311CC is equipped with two external reed switches, which can be used for door and window switch state detection. The built-in wireless module can realize wireless alarm and other functions, and is compatible with the LoRaWAN protocol.

devices.name: R718MA - Wireless Asset Sensor
devices.description: R718MA has a simple positioning function. The device reports its RSSI, SNR information periodically to the gateway. It can be attached to an object, and it sends an alert when it is removed from the premises. The communication is fully compatible with LoRaWAN™ protocol (Class A).

devices.name: R311D - Wireless Asset Sensor
devices.description: he device is a simple positioning function (which can detect the position status of the device), periodically reports RSSI and SNR information to the gateway for processing and can locate the position status of the device according to the reported RSSI and SNR information, and adopts SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R311FB - Wireless Activity Event Counter
devices.description: The device detects the number of movements or vibrations (such as detecting the motor a few times a day), the maximum number of movements or vibrations can reach 2^32 times (theoretical value), and sends the information of the number of movements or vibrations to the gateway for processing. Apply SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R718MBB - Wireless Activity Event Counter
devices.description: The device detects the number of movements or vibrations (such as detecting the motor a few times a day), the maximum number of movements or vibrations can reach 232 times (theoretical value), and sends the information of the number of movements or vibrations to the gateway for processing. Apply SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R311FC - Wireless Activity Timer
devices.description: The device detects the duration of the movement or vibration (timekeeping) and sends the duration or timing information of the movement or vibration to the gateway for processing. The duration of the movement or vibration can be up to 1000 hours (theoretical value). Apply SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R718MBC - Wireless Activity Timer
devices.description: The device detects the duration of the movement or vibration (timekeeping) and sends the duration or timing information of the movement or vibration to the gateway for processing. The duration of the movement or vibration can be up to 1000 hours (theoretical value). SX1276 wireless communication module.

devices.name: R718WA - Wireless Water leak Sensor
devices.description: The Netvox R311W Water Leak Detector comes with one water leak sensor suitable for detecting water and other liquid leaks in residential and commercial buildings. When the sensor detects a leak, an alarm message will be sent to the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: R718WB - Wireless Water Leak Detector with Rope Sensor
devices.description: R718WB is a non-locating leak detection wireless communication device. R718WB can detect the leak status through an external dual-core non-positioning water rope sensor, and send the detected data to data center through the wireless network.

devices.name: TH
devices.description: The nke WATTECO TH sensor measures indoor ambient temperature and humidity in buildings, apartments, and houses. It transmits data over a public or private LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: Temperature indoor sensor
devices.description: The nke WATTECO temperature indoor sensor measures indoor ambient temperature and transmits data over the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: Remote Temperature 2 CTN
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Remote Temperature 2 CTN allows connecting 2 temperature sensor probes for measuring temperature in buildings and transmits the data over a public or private LoRaWAN® radio network.

devices.name: Pulse Sens'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Pulse Sens’O consists of a pulse sensor (counter) for remotely reading metering data from three meters - water, gas, electricity, or energy. It turns existing meters into smart meters via a public or private LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: Press'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Press'O sensor turns any 0-10V, 4-20mA analog gauge into a Class A sensor connected to a public or private LoRaWAN® network that allows the monitoring, measurement, and remote reading of any fluid level (water, oil, gas, etc).

devices.name: Vaqa'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Vaqa’O sensor is a LoRaWAN® device that measures the temperature, relative humidity, concentration of volatile organic compounds (VOC), and carbon dioxide (CO2) in the ambient air of a room, in a building, an apartment, or a house. It allows Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) monitoring.

devices.name: Vaqa'O+Plus
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Vaqa’O+ has sensors for measuring temperature, relative humidity, atmospheric pressure, the concentration of volatile organic compounds (VOC), and carbon dioxide (CO2) in the ambient air of a room in a building, an apartment, or a house. It allows Indoor Air Quality (IAQ) monitoring based on the presence of individuals using luminosity (lighting) and motion (PIR) detection in the room. The data is transmitted via a public or private LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: Remote temperature sensor
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Remote temperature sensor is dedicated to connecting a temperature sensor probe for measuring temperature in buildings, temperature-controlled rooms, cooling towers. It transmits the data over a public or private LoRaWAN® radio network.

devices.name: In'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO In’O includes optocoupled 10 inputs and 4 outputs. It turns any type of I/O sensor/actuator into a Class A or Class C sensor/actuator and connects to a public or private LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: Smart Plug
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Smart Plug sensor supports remotely manage the operation and consumption of common household electrical appliances such as lamps, televisions, and heating equipment.

devices.name: Atm'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Atm’O has sensors for measuring temperature, relative humidity, and atmospheric pressure in outdoors and industrial environments, and transmits the data over a public or private LoRaWAN® radio network.

devices.name: Cels'O
devices.description: The Cels’O sensor measures the ambient temperature as well as the temperature of sensitive products in order to control and observe cold chain integrity in the agri-food and transport sectors

devices.name: Flash'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO LoRaWAN® Flash’O has a pulse sensor for counting the number of light pulses emitted by any type of electronic meter - water, gas, electricity, energy.

devices.name: Humid'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO LoRaWAN® Humid’O Sensor has a liquid sensor probe for detecting water in places like boiler rooms, computer rooms, or data centres.

devices.name: Intens'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Intens’O sensor measures the intensity of electric current using its clamp-on ammeter and determines the state of the equipment based on a selectable current threshold. The data is then transmitted over a public or private LoRaWAN® radio network.

devices.name: Lev'O+
devices.description: The nke WATTECO LoRaWAN®  Lev’O+ has a pressure sensor probe for measuring liquid (water, fuel, oil, fertilizer, etc) levels in tanks.

devices.name: Pulse Sens'O AtEx Zone 1
devices.description: The nke WATTECO LoRaWAN® Pulse Sens'O AtEx Zone 1 has a pulse sensor for reading meter data from water, gas (such as Itron, Esther, and Gazpar), or electricity in AtEx zone 1 sensitive areas. It also includes digital input and voltage sensors.

devices.name: Skydome
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Skydome has an onboard accelerometer for detecting the change of position to verify that a roof window is properly closed.

devices.name: Ventil'O
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Ventil'O has sensors for measuring pressure and temperature in vacuums established by outdoor ventilation chambers.

devices.name: Toran'O AtEx Zone 1
devices.description: The nke WATTECO Toran’O AtEx Zone 1 sensor is used to report status changes, pulse count values, and analog measurements of equipment in the AtEx 1 sensitive zone such as water, gas, electricity, or thermal energy meters, mechanical pressure switches, pressure transducers. It makes existing equipment communicate on a public or private LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: Bob Assistant
devices.description: BoB Assistant is a low power LoRaWAN compatible vibration sensor for indoor and outdoor predictive maintenance industrial applications, coupled with a temperature sensor for environmental conditions, a push buttonand an RGB Led for User Interface.

devices.name: Triphas'O
devices.description: The Triphas’O sensor is used to remotely read the electrical energy consumption of a three-phase installation in a non-intrusive way via the LoRaWAN™ network. It is specially designed to meet the energy management needs of industrial and tertiary buildings that operate with medium / high power, energy intensive equipment.

devices.name: Onethinx LoRaWAN module
devices.description: Onethinx Core LoRaWAN® module integrates Cypress® PSoC® 6 MCU, Semtech® SX126x chipset, dual ARM® Core processor (150MHz / 1MB Flash / 256KB SRAM), compact and highly efficient integrated antenna, and Bluetooth BLE 5.0. It provides faster development of LoRaWAN® products and also reduces development costs.

devices.name: PCR2 Radar People Counter
devices.description: Parametric‘s PCR2 people counter uses radar signals to provide a camera-less solution. Utilising LoRaWAN™ technology, these sensors transmit data at regular intervals. With bi-directional counting, the Parametric PCR2 people counter registers people passing by from left or right.

devices.name: RDR LORA NFC/RFID READER
devices.description: The device reads NFC tags, stores the content together with a timestamp in an internal data buffer. The data is transmitted via a standard LoRaWAN network. The small and stylish device can be mounted on a wall or used as a table top device. The unit is powered by 4x AAA alkaline or NiMH batteries and a USB power supply.

devices.name: RHF0M0E5
devices.description: The RisingHF RHF0M0E5 is a low-cost, ultra-low power, ultra-small LoRaWAN® module that adopts ST system-level package chip STM32WLE5JC, integrated high-performance LoRa® SX126X IP, and ultra-low power consumption MCU. The module is embedded with the LoRaWAN protocol.

devices.name: RHF0M003
devices.description: The RisingHF RHF0M003 module is a low-cost, low-power, ultra-small LoRaWAN® module consisting of the LoRa chip SX127x from Semtech and the low-power microcontroller STM32L07x from ST. The RHF0M003 module is mainly used in wireless sensors, AMRs, wearables, and other low-power IoT devices powered by batteries.

devices.name: RHF3MR01
devices.description: The RisingHF RHF3MR01 auk bridge relay consists of a relay, buttons, and LED indicators. It can be used to turn on and off any electronic or electrical appliance remotely through the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: RHF1S052
devices.description: The RHF1S052 is a LoRaWAN water meter that consists of a magnetic pulse counter for water flow reading and a ball valve for water cut-off.

devices.name: RHF1S213
devices.description: LORAWAN Ultrasonic Intelligent Water Meter

devices.name: NUCLEO-WL55JC1
devices.description: The STMicroelectronics NUCLEO-WL55JC1 is a development board based on the STM32WL55JC microcontroller that comes with a built-in temperature sensor and a light sensor. The NUCLEO-WL55JC1 board supports a wide choice of Integrated Development Environments (IDE) and an expansion connector for Arduino UNO V3. Suitable for rapid prototyping of LoRaWAN® end nodes by adding sensors and actuators.

devices.name: NUCLEO-WL55JC2
devices.description: The STMicroelectronics NUCLEO-WL55JC2 is a development board based on the STM32WL55JC microcontroller that comes with a built-in temperature sensor and a light sensor. The NUCLEO-WL55JC2 board supports a wide choice of Integrated Development Environments (IDE) and an expansion connector for Arduino UNO V3. Suitable for rapid prototyping of LoRaWAN® end nodes by adding sensors and actuators.

devices.name: smart-valve
devices.description: The STREGA LoRaWAN wireless smart-valve has an embedded temperature and humidity sensor, tamper detection sensor, and wire-cut detection sensor. It also accepts external analog, digital, and leak detection sensor inputs. The valve may also be configured for full water meter reading and data transmission capabilities.

devices.name: smart-emitter
devices.description: The STREGA LoRaWAN Time-controlled Emitter remotely actuates an irrigation valve. With its ultra-low-power consumption, the Smart-Emitter can trigger Open or Close operations of any irrigation valve equipped with a DC latching solenoid. Watering schedulers can be programmed directly at the zone level, avoiding the necessity to use an irrigation controller.

devices.name: smart-switch
devices.description: The STREGA time-controlled switch for the valve actuators is a battery operated wireless switch to remote control your butterfly valves. With the ultra-low-power consumption, the smart-switch can be triggered for remote OPEN/CLOSE operations.

devices.name: motorized-valve
devices.description: The STREGA LoRaWAN wireless motorized smart-valve has an embedded temperature and humidity sensor, tamper detection sensor, and wire-cut detection sensor. It also accepts external analog, digital, and leak detection sensor inputs. The valve may also be configured for full water meter reading and data transmission capabilities.

devices.name: OY1100 LoRaWAN® temperature and humidity sensor
devices.description: LoRaWAN sensor that measures temperature and humidity, with an incredible maintenance free lifetime of 10 years at a 5-minute measurement interval. Easy to use, configurable over the air and stylish in design to fit into indoor spaces.

devices.name: OY1110 LoRaWAN® temperature and humidity sensor
devices.description: LoRaWAN sensor that measures temperature and humidity, with an incredible maintenance free lifetime of 10 years at a 5-minute measurement interval. Easy to use, configurable over the air and stylish in design to fit into indoor spaces.

devices.name: OY1200 LoRaWAN® CO2 meter
devices.description: LoRaWAN sensor that measures CO2

devices.name: OY1210 LoRaWAN CO2 meter
devices.description: LoRaWAN sensor that measures temperature, humidity and carbon dioxide, with an incredible maintenance free lifetime of 5 years at a 20-minute reporting interval. Easy to use, configurable over the air and stylish in design to fit into indoor spaces. Supports adaptive reporting functionality to detect rapid changes in CO2 levels.

devices.name: OY1320 LoRaWAN Water meter AMR
devices.description: LoRaWAN sensor designed to function in combination with B Meters’ mechanical water meters. Complete package measures water flow in pipes automatically. Simply mount the LoRaWAN unit on top of a B Meters’ GMDM-RFM mechanical water meter and integrate the meter into your IoT system.

devices.name: OY1700 LoRaWAN Particles meter
devices.description: LoRaWAN sensor that measures temperature, humidity and particles, in indoor environments. Easy to use, configurable over the air and stylish in design to fit into indoor spaces.

devices.name: Smart Room Sensor - Base
devices.description: The TEKTELIC Kona Smart Room Sensor (Base Edition) is a multi-purpose LoRaWAN® end device suitable for home and office environment monitoring. It contains a temperature sensor, humidity sensor, light sensor, magnetic switch, accelerometer, pulse reader, capacitive transducer, and external contacts for adding extra sensors. The smart room sensor can be powered by a single CR2477 battery and allows retrieving battery status for easy maintenance.

devices.name: Smart Room Sensor - PIR
devices.description: The TEKTELIC Kona Smart Room Sensor (PIR Edition) is a multi-purpose LoRaWAN® end device suitable for home and office environment monitoring. It contains a Passive Infrared (PIR) motion sensor, temperature sensor, humidity sensor, light sensor, magnetic switch, accelerometer, pulse reader, capacitive transducer, and external contacts for adding extra sensors. The smart room sensor can be powered by a single CR2477 battery and allows retrieving battery status for easy maintenance.

devices.name: Tektelic Agriculture Sensor
devices.description: The Tektelic Agriculture Sensor features soil moisture sensor, soil temperature sensor, ambient temperature sensor, humidity sensor, and light sensor. It is an ideal solution to streamline and simplify the collection of key soil and environmental metrics for crops, residential and commercial lawns and gardens, and golf courses. The collected data is sent over the LoRaWAN® network for further processing and decision making.

devices.name: Tektelic Industrial Transceiver
devices.description: The Tektelic KONA Industrial Transceiver interfaces automation and control instrumentation to LoRaWAN® networks. It has a temperature sensor and a humidity sensor. It supports up to 3 Analog and Digital inputs enabling remote capture of data, 2 Switched Outputs to activate actuators and different control system components, and a configurable RS-232, RS-422, or RS-485 interface with numerous protocols.

devices.name: Tektelic Industrial Transceiver
devices.description: LoRaWAN® Battery-Powered Radio Transmitter

devices.name: Tektelic Industrial Transceiver
devices.description: LoRaWAN® Battery-Powered Radio Transmitter

devices.name: Tektelic Tundra Sensor
devices.description: The Tektelic LoRaWAN® Tundra Sensor consists of a temperature sensor for cold chain monitoring. It is suitable for applications such as restaurant and food service cold chain, medical and pharmaceutical storage, and vaccine storage.

devices.name: Tektelic Tundra Sensor
devices.description: LoRaWAN® Device for Cold Chain Environment Monitoring

devices.name: Tektelic Industrial GPS Asset Tracker
devices.description: The Tektelic Industrial GPS Asset Tracker combines a GPS tracker and an accelerometer for precisely tracking assets in industrial environments.

devices.name: Tektelic Smart AC Outlet Generation 1
devices.description: The Tektelic Smart AC Outlet and Switch provides users the ability to automatically trigger a 120VAC, 60Hz switch over a LoRaWAN® network, allowing for cost savings from improved power consumption practices and enhanced home and office safety and security.

devices.name: Tektelic Smart AC Switch Generation 1
devices.description: The Tektelic Smart AC Outlet and Switch provides users the ability to automatically trigger a 120VAC, 60Hz switch over a LoRaWAN® network, allowing for cost savings from improved power consumption practices and enhanced home and office safety and security.

devices.name: Tektelic Smart AC Outlet Generation 2
devices.description: Wireless Home / Office Automation driven by LoRaWAN

devices.name: Tektelic Smart AC Switch Generation 2
devices.description: Wireless Home / Office Automation driven by LoRaWAN

devices.name: Tektelic Enterprise Asset Tracker
devices.description: The Tektelic Enterprise Asset Tracker combines Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) and LoRaWAN® for locating, tracking and managing assets in difficult RF environments such as hospitals and medical facilities.

devices.name: Smart Room Sensor - Base
devices.description: The TEKTELIC Kona Smart Room Sensor (Base Edition – Gen 3) is a multi-purpose LoRaWAN® end device suitable for home and office environment monitoring. It contains a temperature sensor, humidity sensor, light sensor, magnetic switch, accelerometer, pulse reader, capacitive transducer, and an ON/OFF external contact. The smart room sensor can be powered by a single CR2477 battery and allows retrieving battery status for easy maintenance.

devices.name: Smart Room Sensor - PIR
devices.description: The TEKTELIC Kona Smart Room Sensor (PIR Edition – Gen 3) is a multi-purpose LoRaWAN® end device suitable for home and office environment monitoring. It contains a Passive Infrared (PIR) motion sensor, temperature sensor, humidity sensor, light sensor, magnetic switch, accelerometer, pulse reader, capacitive transducer, and an ON/OFF external contact. The smart room sensor can be powered by a single CR2477 battery and allows retrieving battery status for easy maintenance.

devices.name: IWM-LR3
devices.description: IWM-LR3 has been designed to allow wireless remote reading in different types of applications from the residential sector to the commercial and industrial sectors. It can read the inductive target of the meter dial using a pulse sensor.

devices.name: Wisblock Starter Kit RAK4631
devices.description: The RAKwireless RAK4631 is a WisBlock Core module that can be plugged into the WisBlock Base allows adding WisBlock sensor modules such as environmental sensor, GNSS location module, temperature & humidity sensor, 3-axis acceleration sensor, ambient light sensor, barometric pressure sensor, infrared temperature sensor, etc. The RAK4631 is based on the 32 bit ARM® Cortex™ - M4 CPU that supports LoRaWAN® and Bluetooth protocols.

devices.name: RAK7431 WisNode Bridge Serial
devices.description: The RAKwireless RAK7431 is an RS485 to LoRaWAN® converter designed for industrial applications that relays ModBUS data using the LoRaWAN network.

devices.name: KLAX
devices.description: The KLAX is a LoRaWAN® device that has an optohead for recording the infrared interface of modern electricity meters.

devices.name: AM107
devices.description: Ambience Monitoring Sensors

devices.name: EM300-TH
devices.description: The Milesight LoRaWAN® EM300-TH consists of a temperature and a humidity sensor monitoring indoor and outdoor environments. It is suitable for applications such as greenhouses, cold chains, food prevention, warehouses, residences, offices, and labs.

devices.name: EM500-CO2
devices.description: The Milesight EM500-CO2 consists of CO2, temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure sensors for measuring gaseous carbon dioxide (CO2) concentration in harsh environments. It is useful in the application where knowing CO2 level is important like greenhouses, wine cellars, building ventilation, fruit and vegetable storage.

devices.name: EM500-UDL
devices.description: The Milesight EM500-UDL consists of an ultrasonic distance/level sensor that provides highly accurate distance measurement for a variety of applications in harsh environments like snow level monitoring, flood monitoring, wastewater management, fill level monitoring in grains or fertilizer. The measurement is based on ultrasonic waves transmitted and reflected back from nearby objects.

devices.name: Temperatur & Humidity Sensor
devices.description: The Browan Temperature & Humidity Sensor integrates temperature and humidity sensors for measuring indoor environments. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data and is suitable for use with consumer or facility management applications.

devices.name: Door/Window Sensor
devices.description: The Browan Door/Window sensor integrates a hall-effect sensor for detecting the opening and closing of doors, windows, garage doors, vaults, and entryways. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: Motion Sensor
devices.description: The Browan Motion Sensor integrates dual passive infrared detectors and the fresnel lens provides a 7m detection range. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data and is suitable for facility management systems to optimize facility usage or cleanliness for desks, conference rooms, bathrooms, etc.

devices.name: Ambient Light Sensor
devices.description: The Browan Ambient Light Sensor integrates an optical sensor providing measurements of ambient light intensity which matches the human eye’s response to light under a variety of lighting conditions. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: Sound Level Sensor
devices.description: The Browan Sound Level Sensor integrates a MEMS microphone for measuring sound levels in decibels (dBA). It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data and is suitable for use in a variety of building environments.

devices.name: Water Leak Sensor
devices.description: The Browan Water Leak Sensor is combined with temperature, humidity, and water leak detection sensors. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to send an uplink notification when a water leak is detected.

devices.name: Push Button
devices.description: The Tabs Push Button with two buttons.

devices.name: IAQ Sensor
devices.description: The Browan IAQ Sensor integrates an indoor air quality sensor (IAQ) for measuring relative humidity, barometric pressure, ambient temperature, and gas (VOC) in indoor environments such as rooms and buildings. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: Strips
devices.description: Strips multisensor by Sensative AB

devices.name: CO2 stoplicht
devices.description: The Teneo IoT CO2 stoplicht is equipped with a CO2 sensor, temperature sensor, and humidity sensor that alarms by means of the traffic light function when the measured values exceed the set standards. The CO2 traffic light has digital communication via LoRaWAN® or WiFi, which makes it possible to log in all measured values and view them remotely.

devices.name: Filling Degree Sensor
devices.description: The Teneo IoT Filling Degree Sensor is a LoRaWAN® waste bin management solution that combines a fillgrade laser sensor that measures the distance to the waste and a GPS receiver to obtain the location of the waste bin. The distance data (from the sensor to the top of the waste) will be sent to the LoRaWAN® network and an online dashboard can be used to display the location of the waste bins.

devices.name: Soil Moisture Sensor
devices.description: The Teneo IoT Soil Moisture Sensor is a dedicated LoRa node designed for remote monitoring of the humidity of the soil; for example with young trees and / or planting.

devices.name: RS485-LN
devices.description: The Dragino RS485-LN is an RS485 to LoRaWAN® converter. It allows the RS485 devices to use LoRaWAN wireless protocol which simplifies the IoT installation and reduces the installation/maintaining cost.

devices.name: RS485-BL
devices.description: The Dragino RS485-BL is an RS485 / UART to LoRaWAN® converter that provides interfaces to connect RS485 sensors, 3.3v/5v UART sensors, and interrupt sensors. The measured data is sent to a LoRaWAN network. Ideal for wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, automated meter reading, industrial monitoring and control, long-range irrigation systems, etc.

devices.name: LSN50v2-S31
devices.description: The Dragino LSN50v2-S31 consists of a temperature and humidity sensor for measuring the temperature and humidity in the surrounding environment. The measured data is then uploaded to the IoT server via LoRaWAN® wireless protocol. It can be used with home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and irrigation systems.

devices.name: LSN50v2-D20
devices.description: The Dragino LSN50v2-D20 consists of a temperature sensor for measuring the temperature of the air, liquid, or any object, and then uploaded to the IoT server via LoRaWAN® wireless protocol.
