It can be used with home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and irrigation systems.

devices.name: LDDS20
devices.description: The Dragino LDDS20 consists of an ultrasonic liquid level sensor for measuring liquid levels. It uses a non-contact method to measure the height of liquid in a container without opening the container. The measured liquid levels are sent to a LoRaWAN® network for further analysis.

devices.name: LDDS75
devices.description: The Dragino LDDS75 consists of an ultrasonic detection sensor for measuring the distance between the sensor and a flat object. It is used to measure the distance between the sensor and a flat object. It uses temperature compensation to improve the reliability of data. The measured distance data are sent to a LoRaWAN® network for further analysis.

devices.name: LBT1
devices.description: The Dragino LBT1 is a LoRaWAN® Bluetooth tracker that consists of a motion sensor and an iBeacon scanner. LBT1 scans and finds the nearest i-Beacon info and sends it to an IoT server via LoRaWAN wireless network.

devices.name: LSE01
devices.description: The Dragino LSE01 consists of soil moisture, soil temperature, and soil conductivity sensors. It is suitable for smart agriculture applications. The measured data is sent to the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: LWL02
devices.description: LoRaWAN Water Leak Sensor

devices.name: LDS02
devices.description: LoRaWAN Door Sensor

devices.name: LWL01
devices.description: The Dragino LWL01 consists of a water leak sensor that detects the water leak status and sends it to the LoRaWAN® network. Suitable for wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and much more.

devices.name: LDS01
devices.description: The Dragino LDS01 consists of a magnetic sensor for detecting the opening and closing of doors, windows, garage doors, vaults, and entryways. The sensor sends a data packet on each open/close event to a LoRaWAN®network server.

devices.name: LGT92
devices.description: The Dragino LGT-92 LoRaWAN® GPS Tracker includes a low-power GPS module for location tracking and a 9-axis accelerometer for motion detection. The captured data is sent to a LoRaWAN network for analysis.

devices.name: LT22222-L
devices.description: The Dragino LT22222-L is a LoRaWAN® I/O module that contains different I/O Interfaces such as analog current input, analog voltage input, relay output, digital input, and digital output. The LT series I/O modules are designed to simplify the installation of I/O monitoring.

devices.name: LT33222-L
devices.description: The Dragino LT33222-L is a LoRaWAN® I/O module that contains different I/O Interfaces such as analog current input, analog voltage input, relay output, digital input, and digital output. The LT series I/O modules are designed to simplify the installation of I/O monitoring.

devices.description: LoRaWAN Temperature & Humidity sensor

devices.description: LoRaWAN LiDAR ToF Distance Sensor

devices.description: Air Quality Sensor

devices.description: The Dragino LSN50-V2 is a LoRaWAN® end device that allows connecting various external sensors, for example, a temperature sensor probe. It can be used with many applications such as wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, automated meter reading, industrial monitoring, and control, and irrigation systems.

devices.name: LSNPK01
devices.description: LoRaWAN Soil NPK Sensor

devices.name: LSPH01
devices.description: LoRaWAN Soil pH Sensor

devices.description: Industrial LoRaWAN Temperature Transmitter

devices.description: LoRaWAN Distance Detection Sensor

devices.description: LoRaWAN Temperature Sensor

devices.name: LDS01
devices.description: The Dragino LDS01 consists of a magnetic sensor for detecting the opening and closing of doors, windows, garage doors, vaults, and entryways. The sensor sends a data packet on each open/close event to a LoRaWAN®network server.

devices.name: LWL01
devices.description: The Dragino LWL01 consists of a water leak sensor that detects the water leak status and sends it to the LoRaWAN® network. Suitable for wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and much more.

devices.name: LSN50-V2
devices.description: The Dragino LSN50-V2 is a LoRaWAN® end device that allows connecting various external sensors, for example, a temperature sensor probe. It can be used with many applications such as wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, automated meter reading, industrial monitoring, and control, and irrigation systems.

devices.name: Arduino MKR WAN 1310
devices.description: The Arduino MKR WAN 1310 is a development board that provides a practical and cost-effective solution to add LoRaWAN® connectivity for projects requiring long-range, low-power wireless communication. Sensors and actuators can be connected to the board through the analog, digital, UART, SPI, and I2C pins. The MKR WAN 1310 comes complete with an ATECC508 secure element, a battery charger, 2MByte SPI Flash, and power consumption as low as 104 uA.

devices.name: Portenta Vision Shield LoRa®
devices.description: The Arduino Portenta Vision Shield LoRa® consists of a 320x320 pixels camera sensor and two onboard microphones for directional sound detection. It allows you to run embedded computer vision applications. The Vision Shield LoRa® has been designed to work with the Arduino Portenta H7.

devices.name: IMBuildings People counter
devices.description: Infrared based battery powered People Counter

devices.name: IMBuildings Comfort Sensor
devices.description: Sensor for monitoring Indoor Air Quality

devices.name: IMBuildings Moodbox
devices.description: Get user feedback

devices.name: IMBuildings Office Occupancy Counter
devices.description: Infrared based Office Occupancy Counter

devices.name: Tx Pulse 600-036
devices.description: The Enless Wireless Tx Pulse 600-036 consists of a pulse sensor that is compatible with pulse meters with a dry contact interface or an open collector inlet. It transmits pulse counts over the LoRaWAN® network. Tx Pulse 600-036 will quickly and economically transform your conventional gas meter into a smart meter.

devices.name: LW001-BG
devices.description: The Moko Smart LW001-BG is a LoRaWAN® indoor and outdoor tracker that consists of GPS, accelerometer, temperature, humidity, and pressure sensors. Ideal to optimize the logistic process, asset management, warehouse and inventory scenarios, outdoor tracking, theft protection, and much more.

devices.name: LW003-B
devices.description: The Moko Smart LW003-B integrates LoRaWAN® and Bluetooth wireless communication. It can scan BLE Beacon data and send data to the LoRaWAN gateway, and then upload it to the server to realize environmental monitoring and indoor positioning.

devices.name: LW004
devices.description: The Moko LW004-CT is a wearable tracker and a social safety distance reminder suitable for COVID-19 contact tracing. It can be used to track close contacts by advertising and scanning Bluetooth low-energy beacons. The LW004-CT also includes a 3-axis accelerometer. The scanned data will be sent to the LoRaWAN® network to trace all contacts.

devices.name: LW005
devices.description: LW005 is a compact, multi-purposes, easy-to -use, wireless LoRaWAN power meter for indoor use. It can remotely control the output switch and detect the output power.

devices.name: MClimate Vicki - Smart Radiator Thermostat
devices.description: The MClimate Vicki is a smart radiator thermostat valve that contains a temperature and humidity sensor allowing for temperature control and monitoring temperature and humidity from distance through a LoRaWAN® network. Manual target temperature selection is possible by rotating the outer ring of the device. The target temperature is displayed on the device.

devices.name: MClimate T-Valve - Water valve
devices.description: The MClimate T-Valve is a LoRaWAN® water valve equipped with water temperature, ambient temperature, magnetic, flood, and box tampering sensors. It can be used in residential or commercial buildings.

devices.name: MClimate Flood Sensor
devices.description: The MClimate Flood Sensor contains a flood sensor for detecting floods and water leakage in residential and commercial buildings. In addition to that, the MClimate flood sensor contains a device tampering detection sensor and a temperature sensor. When a flood or fraud is detected an uplink containing the desired values is transferred to the LoRaWAN® network.

devices.name: MClimate Humidity and Temperature Sensor
devices.description: The MClimate HT LoRaWAN® Sensor is an indoor temperature and humidity sensor with 10+ years of battery life ideal for monitoring environments in residential and commercial buildings.

devices.name: MClimate Air Quality Sensor & Notifier (AQI)
devices.description: The MClimate AQI Sensor and Notifier is a LoRaWAN® indoor Air Quality Index Sensor and Notifier featuring gas, humidity, pressure, and temperature sensors. These sensors measure AQI, VOC (ppm), temperature, humidity, and barometric pressure. It also has a configurable buzzer and RGB LED to notify tenants if the Air Quality Index is below a configurable threshold.

devices.name: MClimate CO2 Sensor and Notifier
devices.description: MClimate CO2 Sensor and Notifier is a device that uses NDIR technology to measure the actual CO2 and has built in temperature and humidity sensors. The device also has acoustic and visual notification abilities to indicate occupants whether a room should be ventilated.

devices.name: Ball Valve Servo
devices.description: The Aqua-Scope Ball Valve Servo consists of a patented motor coupling that fits with existing ball valves and converts them into smart water control devices. It can receive commands directly from a flood sensor, aqua-scope controller, or LoRaWAN® gateways.

devices.name: Flood Sensor
devices.description: The Aqua-Scope Water Sensor has a built-in water sensor and a freeze sensor that detects water leaks and floods in critical areas. In addition to the built-in water sensor, it allows connecting an external second water detection probe. When the water is detected, an alarm is sent to a gateway using LoRaWAN® wireless protocol.

devices.name: The Things Node
devices.description: The Things Node is based on the SparkFun Pro Micro - 3.3V/8MHz with added Microchip LoRaWAN® module and temperature sensor, NXP’s digital accelerometer, a light sensor, button, and RGB LED. All this is packaged in a matchbox-sized waterproof (IP54) casing with 3 AAA batteries to power it for months of usage.

devices.name: The Things Uno
devices.description: The Things Uno is based on the Arduino Leonardo with an added Microchip LoRaWAN® module. It is fully compatible with the Arduino IDE and existing shields.

devices.name: Generic Node (Sensor Edition)
devices.description: The Things Industries Generic Node Sensor Edition is a LoRaWAN® development board that consists of a temperature and humidity sensor and an accelerometer. These onboard sensors can be used to measure temperature, humidity, motion, free fall, and orientation. In addition to that, it provides expansion slots for connecting various sensors. It is suitable for a wide range of use cases that cover industrial, farming, facility management, and leisure.

devices.name: Temperature and Humidity Sensor
devices.description: Indoor sensor for temperature and humidity

devices.name: DigiSilo Radar Sensor
devices.description: The Beiselen Service GmbH DigiSilo is a compact distance measurement device and presence detector that consists of low power, high precision, pulsed short-range radar sensor and can measure in a distance range from 50 cm to 7 meters. DigiSilo is made for silo monitoring with different mediums like grain, feedstock, flour, or liquids.

devices.name: izi-io 4840
devices.description: The izinto izi-io 4840 is a multi-I/O controller with edge computing and LoRaWAN® connection that provides software configurable inputs for connecting digital, analog, and temperature sensors as well as Modbus and other serial devices.

devices.name: izi-io 4840 /grid
devices.description: Specially designed for monitoring local power grid transformation substations ("Ortsnetzstationen" in Germany, 10 kV → 230 V), the izinto izi-io 4840 /grid is an industry-strength controller with edge computing and LoRaWAN® connection that connects to a Jean Müller PLMulti-II measuring device via Modbus/RTU. Additionally, up to 8 temperature sensors and switches may be connected.

devices.name: izi-io 4840 /heat
devices.description: Specially designed for monitoring building heating systems, the izinto izi-io 4840 /heat is an industry-strength controller with edge computing and LoRaWAN® connection. Up to 8 temperature sensors or other inputs such as sensors and switches may be connected.

devices.name: Remote Water Meter Reader
devices.description: The Develiot Remote Water Meter Reader comes with 2 digital inputs, 2 digital outputs, and with an embedded temperature sensor. It is designed to easily connect with standard pulse water meters or other 3rd party equipment and it transmits data wirelessly and autonomously utilizing LoRaWAN® network protocol.

devices.name: Remote Water Meter Reader XL
devices.description: The Develiot Remote Water Meter Reader XL comes with 2 digital inputs, 2 analog inputs, 2 digital outputs and with an embedded temperature sensor. It is designed to easily connect with standard pulse water meters or other 3rd party equipment and it transmits data wirelessly and autonomously utilizing LoRaWAN® network protocol.

devices.name: Urban Air Quality Monitoring Station
devices.description: The Develiot Urban Air Quality Monitoring Station equipped with a wide range of sensors such as air quality (NO2, SO2, O3, CO, NH3, H2S, PH3, Cl2, HCl, HF, O2, CH2O, C2H4, C6H6, H2, PM10, PM2.5, PM1.0),  CO2, noise level, temperature, humidity, pressure, wind speed, wind direction, and precipitation. It provides GSM, NBIoT, and LoRaWAN wireless connectivity for sending data.

devices.name: Water Monitoring Station
devices.description: The Develiot Urban Air Quality Monitoring Station equipped with a wide range of sensors such as air quality (NO2, SO2, O3, CO, NH3, H2S, PH3, Cl2, HCl, HF, O2, CH2O, C2H4, C6H6, H2, PM10, PM2.5, PM1.0),  CO2, noise level, temperature, humidity, pressure, wind speed, wind direction, and precipitation. It provides GSM, NBIoT, and LoRaWAN wireless connectivity for sending data.

devices.name: Urban Noise Monitoring Station
devices.description: The Noise Level Monitoring Station is a hardware noise monitoring solution that helps cities and communities sense accurate noise level data. The Station operates autonomously without requiring external power source or manual data gathering.

devices.name: Sound Level Meter
devices.description: The IoTsens Sound Level Meter has an integrated microphone (sound sensor) that can monitor noise levels. The collected data is transmitted over the LoRaWAN® network for further processing.

devices.name: Air Quality Monitor
devices.description: The IoTsens Air Quality Monitor is a device that consists of a set of environmental sensors for  CO, SO2, NO2, O3, NO, H2S, CO2, PM2.5, PM10, temperature, and humidity detection and measurement. The use of this device is recommended for the evaluation of air conditions, being able to monitor the levels of contamination to make the appropriate decisions.

devices.name: Optical Distance Monitor
devices.description: The IoTsens LoRaWAN® Optical Distance Monitor is equipped with a LIDAR sensor for monitoring filling levels. Thus, it becomes an optimal tool in waste management, and can also be used in the detection of liquid levels in tanks, among other applications.

devices.name: Senstick Pro
devices.description: The Sensedge Senstick Pro is an industrial-grade LoRaWAN® microclimate sensor for use with indoor or outdoor harsh environments that features temperature, humidity, pressure, and movement sensors. Suitable for applications such as monitoring temperature in medical refrigerators, improving thermal comfort for workers, reducing overheating of machines in manufacturing, monitoring temperature and humidity of raw materials, etc.

devices.name: Senstick Pure
devices.description: The Sensedge Senstick Pure is an indoor LoRaWAN® air quality and microclimate sensor that features IAQ, temperature, humidity, and pressure sensors. Suitable for monitoring air quality in personal and public spaces. The device sends data to the LoRaWAN® network and notifies users to open the windows if the air quality is poor.

devices.name: EMB-LR1280S
devices.description: The embit EMB-LR1280S is an ultra-low-power OEM Embit module. It is based on Semtech’s SX1280 long-range 2.4 GHz transceiver coupled with STM32L073 MCU. EMB-LR1280S can communicate with other devices through a wide range of serial interfaces such as UART, I2C, USB, SPI, and several digital and analog I/O.

devices.name: EMB-LRWL55
devices.description: The EMB-LRWL55 is an ultra-low-power LoRaWAN® OEM module based on STM32WL55xx. It is based on Arm® Cortex®‐M4 and Cortex®-M0+ dual cores both running at 48 MHz, and a sub-GHz radio based on Semtech’s SX126x. EMB-LRWL55 is a software open platform, which embeds a fully compliant LoRa® transceiver.

devices.name: EMB-LR1280-mPCI-4x
devices.description: The embit EMB-LR1280-mPCIe-4x is a mini PCI express multichannel LoRa® card. It can operate worldwide being fully compliant with 2.4 GHz frequency band regulation. It is suitable for applications that require long-range connectivity like logistic and supply chain, industrial monitoring and control, factory automation, home & building automation, and wireless alarm & security systems.

devices.name: EMB-LR1302-mPCI
devices.description: The embit EMB-LR1302-mPCI is a mini PCI express multichannel LoRa® card. It can operate on the 868 or 915 MHz radio band. It is suitable for applications that require long-range connectivity like logistic and supply chain, industrial monitoring and control, factory automation, home & building automation, and wireless alarm & security systems.

devices.name: RS485-LN
devices.description: The Dragino RS485-LN is an RS485 to LoRaWAN® converter. It allows the RS485 devices to use LoRaWAN wireless protocol which simplifies the IoT installation and reduces the installation/maintaining cost.

The measured data is sent to a LoRaWAN network. Ideal for wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, automated meter reading, industrial monitoring and control, long-range irrigation systems, etc.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LSN50v2-S31
devices.description: The Dragino LSN50v2-S31 consists of a temperature and humidity sensor for measuring the temperature and humidity in the surrounding environment. The measured data is then uploaded to the IoT server via LoRaWAN® wireless protocol. It can be used with home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and irrigation systems.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LSN50v2-D20
devices.description: The Dragino LSN50v2-D20 consists of a temperature sensor for measuring the temperature of the air, liquid, or any object, and then uploaded to the IoT server via LoRaWAN® wireless protocol. It can be used with home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and irrigation systems.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LDDS20
devices.description: The Dragino LDDS20 consists of an ultrasonic liquid level sensor for measuring liquid levels. It uses a non-contact method to measure the height of liquid in a container without opening the container. The measured liquid levels are sent to a LoRaWAN® network for further analysis.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LDDS75
devices.description: The Dragino LDDS75 consists of an ultrasonic detection sensor for measuring the distance between the sensor and a flat object. It is used to measure the distance between the sensor and a flat object. It uses temperature compensation to improve the reliability of data. The measured distance data are sent to a LoRaWAN® network for further analysis.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LBT1
devices.description: The Dragino LBT1 is a LoRaWAN® Bluetooth tracker that consists of a motion sensor and an iBeacon scanner. LBT1 scans and finds the nearest i-Beacon info and sends it to an IoT server via LoRaWAN wireless network.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LSE01
devices.description: The Dragino LSE01 consists of soil moisture, soil temperature, and soil conductivity sensors. It is suitable for smart agriculture applications. The measured data is sent to the LoRaWAN® network.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LWL01
devices.description: The Dragino LWL01 consists of a water leak sensor that detects the water leak status and sends it to the LoRaWAN® network. Suitable for wireless alarm and security systems, home and building automation, industrial monitoring and control, and much more.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: LDS01
devices.description: The Dragino LDS01 consists of a magnetic sensor for detecting the opening and closing of doors, windows, garage doors, vaults, and entryways. The sensor sends a data packet on each open/close event to a LoRaWAN®network server.
devices.vendor-name: Enthu Technology Solutions India Pvt Ltd

devices.name: Abeeway Geolocation Module
devices.description: The Abeeway Geolocation module for outdoor geolocation contains a high-performance multi-constellation GNSS receiver (GPS, GLONASS, Beidou, and Galileo) and supports a patented ultra Low-Power GPS (LP GPS) mode. Indoor positioning can be achieved by combining the Bluetooth Low Energy receiver and the ultra-low power Wi-Fi receiver.

devices.name: Abeeway Industrial Tracker
devices.description: The Abeeway Industrial Tracker has embedded sensors combining GPS, Low-power GPS, Wi-Fi Sniffer, and LoRaWAN® TDoA geolocation technologies, supporting accurate outdoor and indoor geolocation. In addition to that, it has embedded sensors for measuring temperature, motion, and pressure. This tracker is an ideal solution for industry tracking and asset management needs.

devices.name: Abeeway Compact Tracker
devices.description: The Abeeway Compact Tracker is a highly versatile multi-mode tracker for outdoor and indoor geolocation with embedded sensors combining GPS, Low-power GPS, Wi-Fi Sniffer, BLE, and LoRa TDoA geolocation technologies.

devices.name: Abeeway Micro Tracker
devices.description: The Abeeway Micro Tracker is a multi-mode tracker for indoor and outdoor use. It provides accurate indoor and outdoor positioning using embedded geolocation sensors combining GPS, Low-power GPS, Wi-Fi Sniffing, BLE, and LoRaWAN® TDoA geolocation technologies. Ideal for tracking anything including people, pets, vehicles, and assets with antitheft and geofencing technologies.

devices.name: Abeeway Smart Badge
devices.description: The Abeeway Smart Badge is a wearable LoRaWAN® multi-mode tracker with embedded sensors combining various location tracking technologies such as GPS, Low-power GPS, Wi-Fi Sniffer, BLE, and LoRaWAN TDoA. In addition to that, the Abeeway Smart Badge features a temperature sensor, SOS panic button, and a buzzer.

devices.name: Windy Module
devices.description: The Midatronics Windy Module is based on the ST Microelectronics STM32WL, System-On-Chip integrates both a general-purpose microcontroller and a sub-GHz radio on the same chip. Built on an Arm® Cortex®‐M4 core architecture, STM32WL microcontrollers also support multiple modulations – LoRa®, (G)FSK, (G)MSK, BPSK – to ensure flexibility in wireless applications with LoRaWAN®, Sigfox® or any other suitable protocol in a fully open way.

devices.name: MKR WINDY
devices.description: The Midatronics MKR WINDY is an Arduino MKR1000 form factor board based on the Midatronics WINDY Module, an IoT module with onboard uFL connector based on the ST Microelectronics STM32WL, System-On-Chip integrates both a general-purpose microcontroller and a sub-GHz radio on the same chip. Built on an Arm® Cortex®‐M4 core architecture, STM32WL microcontrollers support multiple modulations – LoRa®, (G)FSK, (G)MSK, and BPSK.

devices.name: Sharky
devices.description: The Midatronics Sharky PCB is an IoT-certified module with an onboard PCB antenna based on the ST Microelectronics STM32WB55CEU6 system on chip, a highly integrated low power radio design with two cores in a single SoC. There is an ARM Cortex-M4 32-bit microprocessor to run your application and one ARM Cortex-M0+ 32-bit microprocessor running the radio networking Stack. The Sharky module supports BLE, Thread, ZigBee, and generic IEEE 802.15.4 protocol stacks.

devices.name: BoatOfficer Blue
devices.description: The BoatOfficer Blue is a tracking device that measures the position of a boat using the integrated GPS tracker. In addition to that, it has an integrated temperature sensor and a vibration sensor. It also supports adding sensor cables for monitoring battery voltage, detecting motor activity, and detecting water. The collected data is transferred via LoRaWAN®.

devices.name: SenseCAP Wireless Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor - LoRaWAN
devices.description: The Seeed Studio SenseCAP ‘Wireless Soil Moisture and Temperature Sensor’ measures soil volumetric water content (VWC) and temperature. Suitable for outdoor and harsh environments.

devices.name: SenseCAP Wireless Air Temperature and Humidity Sensor - LoRaWAN
devices.description: The Seeed Studio SenseCAP Wireless Air Temperature and Humidity Sensor measures temperature and humidity in the atmosphere. It's designed with a 2-in-1 sensor, a custom battery, and an IP66 enclosure, optimized for outdoor use cases that need reliable data collected over years. The collected data is sent over the LoRaWAN® network for further processing and decision making.

devices.name: SenseCAP Wireless Light Intensity Sensor - LoRaWAN
devices.description: The Seeed Studio SenseCAP Wireless Light Intensity Sensor is a LoRaWAN® end device that measures the intensity of light in lux from 0 - 188000 lux. It is designed with battery-powered and IP66 enclosure for outdoor use, optimized for use cases that need reliable data collection over years.

devices.name: SenseCAP Wireless CO2 Sensor - LoRaWAN
devices.description: The Seeed Studio SenseCAP Wireless CO2 Sensor connects an external NDIR CO2 sensor that measures levels of CO2 emission in the atmosphere. It's dustproof, optimal for use cases that need reliable data collection, even in dusted indoor environments such as chicken farms. The collected data is transferred via LoRaWAN®.

devices.name: SenseCAP Wireless Barometric Pressure Sensor - LoRaWAN
devices.description: The Seeed Studio SenseCAP Wireless Barometric Pressure Sensor measures atmospheric pressure, featuring high-precision, stability, and high EMC robustness. It’s designed with an air pressure sensor, a custom battery, and an industry-grade enclosure, optimized for outdoor use cases that need reliable data collected over years. The collected data is sent over the LoRaWAN® network for further processing and decision making.

devices.name: LoRa-E5 STM32WLE5JC Module, embedded SX126X and MCU for LoRaWAN Network
devices.description: The Seeed Studio LoRa-E5 LoRaWAN® module is designed with ST system-level package chip STM32WLE5JC, ARM Cortex M4 ultra-low-power MCU, and LoRa SX126X. It supports (G)FSK mode and LoRa.

devices.name: Smart Parking Sensor
devices.description: The Nwave Smart Parking Sensor is equipped with a magnetometer, temperature, and proximity sensors for parking detection. The smart parking sensors installed in each parking spot generate data on space occupancy in real-time and is transmitted over a LoRaWAN network.

devices.name: TEKZIPARK
devices.description: The TEKZITEL TEKZIPARK is a smart parking sensor that uses radar technology. It enables occupancy status updates of parking spots wirelessly to the cloud environment through a LoRaWAN® network. This helps to efficiently manage the parking spaces in real-time.

devices.name: HTCC-AB02S(Class A OTAA)
devices.description: The Heltec HTCC-AB02S (Class A OTAA) / CubeCell GPS-6502 is a LoRaWAN® development board based on ASR605x (ASR6501, ASR6502) that integrates a GPS module. The ASR605x chip is integrated with the PSoC® 4000 series MCU (ARM® Cortex® M0+ Core) and SX1262. HTCC-AB02S allows connecting various sensors and supports the Arduino® development environment.

devices.description: The HelTec Turtle board (Class A OTAA) is a LoRaWAN® development board that supports standard LoRaWAN protocol and RadioShuttle protocol. It allows connecting various sensors through its pins.

devices.name: M-Bus IoT converter
devices.description: The Acrios M-Bus IoT converter is an M-Bus to LoRaWAN® converter that can be used for reading electricity meters and calorimeters. The M-Bus converter supports connections of up to 5 UL (Unit Loads) and communication is based on the EN 137 57-3 protocol.

devices.name: ZHAGA smart street light module
devices.description: Smart street lighting module with ZHAGA socket based on the STM32WL

devices.name: ESPEasy RN2483 (Class A ABP)
devices.description: The ESPEasy RN2483 (Class A ABP) is a LoRaWAN® development board on Microchip RN2483 that supports Activation by Personalization (ABP). It supports over 100 sensors.

devices.name: ESPEasy RN2483 (Class A OTAA)
devices.description: The ESPEasy RN2483 (Class A OTAA) is a LoRaWAN® development board on Microchip RN2483 that supports Over The Air Activation (OTAA). It supports over 100 sensors.

devices.name: ESPEasy RN2903 (Class A ABP)
devices.description: The ESPEasy RN2903 (Class A ABP) is a LoRaWAN® development board on Microchip RN2903 that supports Activation by Personalization (ABP). It supports over 100 sensors.

devices.name: ESPEasy RN2903 (Class A OTAA)
devices.description: The ESPEasy RN2903 (Class A OTAA) is a LoRaWAN® development board on Microchip RN2903 that supports Over The Air Activation (OTAA). It supports over 100 sensors.

devices.name: Pressure Transducer
devices.description: The Moire Labs Digital pressure transducer P1AP is a telemetry-enabled, battery-powered pressure sensor, which is primarily used to measure pressure in distribution pipes of gasses or liquids and sending the measured data over the wireless network into centralized measurement systems such as SCADA.

devices.name: Temperature Transducer
devices.description: The Moire Labs Digital temperature transducer P1AT is a telemetry-enabled, battery-powered LoRaWAN® temperature sensor, which is primarily used to measure temperature in distribution pipes of gasses or liquids and sending the measured data over the wireless network into centralized measurement systems such as SCADA.

devices.name: df702
devices.description: The CNDingtek DF702 is a waste bin sensor that consists of a level sensor, fire sensor, and accelerometer. The measured data is reported to a LoRaWAN® network that notifies garbage collecting authorities to collect and empty the bins.

devices.name: dc410
devices.description: The CNDingtek DC410 is a smart manhole sensor that integrates a liquid/solid level sensor and a movement sensor. Suitable for measuring water and sewage levels in wells and manholes. The data is sent to a LoRaWAN network, then the application server for further processing.

devices.name: df530
devices.description: lpg tank level sensor, detect liquid level in tank.

devices.name: MERLIN 868 HB-G3
devices.description: The Merlin 868 HB-G3 LoRaWAN® module consists of a pulse/hall effect sensor that is suitable for both the volume meters and the S220. The module communicates with both the LoRaWAN and the Sigfox network.

devices.name: LoRa wireless water meter
devices.description: The Innotas Modularis water meter attachment consists of a pulse sensor that counts pulses for calculating the water flow volume. It can be attached to water meters with Modularis metering shaft (E. Wehrle GmbH, Wasser-Geräte GmbH, Meibes Systemtechnik GmbH, Maddalena GmbH, QUNDIS and others), ingle-jet and multi-jet dry dial water meters, annular piston, and measuring capsule water meters.

devices.name: ERS smart building sensor
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS is a LoRaWAN® device that consists of motion, temperature, humidity, and light sensors for measuring occupancy and the indoor environment.  It is suitable for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, workplace statistics, facility management, and room occupancy.

devices.name: ERS CO2 advanced indoor environment
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS CO2 is a LoRaWAN® device that has internal sensors for measuring temperature, humidity, light, motion, and CO2 level. It can be used for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, and room occupancy measuring.

devices.name: ERS CO2 Lite indoor co2 monitoring
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS CO2 Lite is a LoRaWAN® device that has internal sensors for measuring temperature, humidity, and CO2 level. It can be used for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, and workplace management.

devices.name: ERS VOC indoor air quality
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS VOC is a LoRaWAN® device that has internal sensors for measuring VOC levels, temperature, humidity, light, and motion (PIR). It can be used for presence monitor systems and is ideal for workplace management.

devices.name: ERS EYE for advanced indoor and occupancy monitoring
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS Eye is a LoRaWAN® device that consists of motion, temperature, humidity, and light sensors for measuring occupancy and the indoor environment.  It is suitable for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, workplace statistics, facility management, and room occupancy.

devices.name: ERS SOUND indoor environment sensor
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS Sound is an advanced indoor environment LoRaWAN® sensor that consists of temperature, humidity, light, motion, and sound sensors. It is suitable for indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, room occupancy, sound level control in public spaces, schools, libraries, etc.

devices.name: ERS Lite indoor environment monitoring
devices.description: The ELSYS ERS Lite is an indoor LoRaWAN® room sensor that contains two internal sensors for measuring indoor temperature and humidity. It is suitable for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, and workplace management.

devices.name: ELT-2 LoRaWAN wireless sensor
devices.description: The ELSYS ELT Ultrasonic is a LoRaWAN® end device that has sensors for measuring distance, temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure. It is the ideal sensor for measuring in advanced places or extreme weather conditions.

devices.name: ELT Lite an easy but powerful LoRAWAN device for measuring analog or digital signals.
devices.description: The ELSYS ELT Lite is a general LoRaWAN® device for measuring analog or digital signals. It is a 1-channel GPIO wireless transceiver and can also provide power to external sensors. ELT Lite is suitable for applications such as smart cities, agriculture, and distance measuring.

devices.name: ELT-2 LoRaWAN wireless sensor
devices.description: The ELT-2 have the capability of solving almost any problem. It is enclosed in an IP67 box which makes it ideal for mounting outside or in extreme conditions.

devices.name: EMS Elsys mini sensor
devices.description: The ELSYS EMS Mini is equipped with temperature, humidity, accelerometer, door switch (reed switch), and water leak sensors. It is suitable for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, water leakage detection, door activity detection, and movement detection. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: EMS DOOR but more than just doors
devices.description: The ELSYS EMS Door is equipped with a door switch (reed switch) for detecting the opening and closing of doors, windows, garage doors, vaults, and entryways. It also includes an accelerometer for movement detection. The EMS Door is suitable for applications such as door activity detection, movement detection, smart buildings, and workplace management. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: EMS Lite Small but powerful
devices.description: The ELSYS EMS Lite is equipped with a temperature and humidity sensor for indoor environmental monitoring. It also includes a leak sensor for detecting water leakage. The EMS Lite is suitable for applications such as indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, and water leakage detection. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: EMS Desk a small sensor for monitoring occupancy
devices.description: The ELSYS EMS Desk is equipped with a body heat sensor (thermopile) for detecting desk occupancy. It also includes a temperature sensor, humidity sensor (for indoor environment monitoring), and accelerometer (for movement detection). The EMS Desk is suitable for applications such as occupancy detection, indoor environment measuring, smart buildings, workplace management, and movement detection. It utilizes LoRaWAN® connectivity to transmit data.

devices.name: Xignal Mouse Trap
devices.description: Intelligent mouse trap made by DimoSystems

devices.name: Xignal Rat Trap
devices.description: Intelligent Rat trap made by DimoSystems

devices.name: ESP32-Paxcounter
devices.description: The ESP32-Paxcounter has sensors for battery, GPS, altitude, temperature, humidity, barometer, pm2.5, and pm10. It is an ESP32 MCU-based device for metering passenger flows in real-time. It counts how many mobile devices are around by scanning WiFi and Bluetooth signals in the air and provides an estimation of how many people are around. The captured data is transmitted over a public or private LoRaWAN® radio network.

devices.name: ed10w
devices.description: ED10W is a smart IoT watch based on LoRaWAN. Combined with motion sensor, it can achieve indoor and outdoor real-time positioning. With wearing detection, it can realize a real-time collection of health data such as heart rate, body temperature,blood pressure, and steps. The data will be transmitted to the platform through the LoRaWAN Network.

devices.name: ed20w
devices.description: ED20W is a smart IoT watch based on LoRaWAN. Combined with motion sensor, it can achieve indoor and outdoor real-time positioning. With wearing detection, it can realize a real-time collection of health data such as heart rate, body temperature,blood pressure, and steps. The data will be transmitted to the platform through the LoRaWAN Network.

devices.name: HarvyLR 36
devices.description: Self-powered LoRaWAN IoT sensor for AC and DC currents

devices.name: HarvyLR 360
devices.description: Self-powered LoRaWAN IoT sensor for AC and DC currents

devices.name: MUTELCOR LoRa Panic Button with Confirmation
devices.description: The Mutelcor LoRa Panic Button with Confirmation is a LoRaWAN® emergency response device that enables users to quickly raise an alarm, notify security and to seek assistance in a matter of seconds by pressing a button. Its unique confirmation feature can indicate if the button-press has been received and acknowledged by the backend application. A physical feedback to the button press using a buzzer and LED can be configured.

devices.name: MUTELCOR Smart CO2 LoRa Sensor (IP30, IP54)
devices.description: The Mutelcor Smart CO2 LoRa Sensor is a unique power-driven Air Quality sensor. It measures CO2, Temperature and Humidity every 2 seconds with a robust dual-channel NDIR sensor and offers automatic Traffic Light Feature with local and LoRa-based Alarms based on multi-color LEDs and Sound. The device offers plug-and-play handling with multiple Threshold settings and quick and easy Calibration.

devices.name: MUTELCOR LoRa Manhole Sensor
devices.description: The Mutelcor LoRa Manhole Sensor is a LoRaWAN® Device that detects opening and closing of manholes and/or any external doors. The device notifies alerts in real time to prevent accidents and to quickly react to unauthorized opening of manholes and external doors.

devices.name: MUTELCOR LoRa Customer Feedback
devices.description: The Mutelcor LoRa Customer Feedback is an end-to-end feedback monitoring device leveraging LoRaWAN® Technology. An easy to use device with 3 smiley-buttons which facilitates to gather, analyse and report user feedback in real time.

devices.name: MUTELCOR LoRa Service Call Button
devices.description: The Mutelcor LoRa Service Call Button is a LoRaWAN® Device that raises alarms or requests to multiple services for help, assistance or support from a single device in real time in a matter of seconds by pressing a button. A physical feedback to the button press using a buzzer and LED can be configured.

devices.name: Pengy
devices.description: Device for monitoring of the air quality parameters like air temperature and relative humidity, atmospheric pressure, environmental noise and particulate matter mass concetration.

devices.name: OpenCollar
devices.description: First generation of OpenCollar devices. A collection of advanced devices designed for wildlife protection.

devices.name: Carbon
devices.description: Carbon measures the CO2 level and continuously monitors air quality to visually alert occupants when it is time to ventilate to renew indoor air. With its temperature and humidity sensors, Carbon also analyzes the ambient parameters of the building. Carbon integrates the iZiAiR air quality and hygrothermal comfort algorithm to easily study each indoor environment and identify possible improvements. Thanks to its wireless communication module, data can be accessed remotely, simply from a smartphone or a computer screen

devices.name: Terabee LoRa Level Monitoring XL
devices.description: Monitor material fill levels inside your silos and tanks using wireless, low-energy Terabee IoT devices. Our LED Time-of-Flight technology can reach up to 60m range for non-intrusive inventory management - from small to even the largest silos!

devices.name: uRADMonitor MODEL A3
devices.description: Plug and play advanced air quality monitoring station, enclosed in an aluminium body for rugged design, it has sensors for Particulate Matter (PM2.5, PM1, PM10), Ozone, Formaldehyde, Carbon Dioxide, Volatile Organic Compounds (VOC), temperature, barometric pressure, air humidity and noise.

devices.name: uRADMonitor MODEL INDUSTRIAL
devices.description: An automated, fixed monitoring station that tracks a total of 11 important air quality parameters including Particulate Matter, Carbon Monoxide, Ozone, Sulphur Dioxide, Nitrogen Dioxide and more for the INDUSTRIAL sector. It comes in a rugged aluminum enclosure with wall mounting support

devices.description: 3-phase energy meter with MID B+D approval for billing purpose. Connection: Direct (100A) or indirect (CT /5 and /1A). Internal clock. External or internal antenna.

devices.description: LoRaWAN Operated Low Power Pressure Transmitter for Liquid and Gas Media

devices.name: MLR003
devices.description: MLR003 is a maintenance free, intelligent thermostatic radiator valve actuator.It is an 868MHz LoRaWAN® Class A device operating in SF7BW125.
